Review Title: No longer the Radisson we knew
Review Text: I use to stay at this hotel regularly  (approx 2016-2019) having changed from ECO Hotel. The hotel was a true 4* Radisson. Apart from the concierge driver service and the cheerful staff, this hotel is no longer the Radisson we use to know. The maintenance is absent, the water out of the tap is yellow and smells of chlorine, the furniture are tattered, the hotel cannot print business documents unless prior notice is given, the food is average, the corridors smell of sewerage and vomit, the hotel has posted disclaimers in many areas (e.g. the restaurant, laundry services )  etc..  the Radisson should really reconsider its branding there. We have been recommended to Art Hotel and the refurbished Eco hotel.

Hotel exterior was good. Air conditioner looked dirty when I looked up while seating on the chair, so I wore a mask inside the room. Staffs were so friendly and I felt good. Breakfast was so delicious and I enjoyed it.

We had a really fantastic stay  . Everything from the pool, the food , room and the excellent staff exceeded our expectations. The staff were extremely professional ,friendly, genuine and helpful . On the morning we were due to fly home a driver I had organised did not show up and the reception staff were so helpful and had a driver organised for us in a couple of minutes .  We will definitely be back .

Review Title: AVOID! THIS IS NOT A 5*STAR HOTEL
Review Text: The whole toilet and bathroom needs complete overhaul and changing. The toilet and bathroom is so dirty with mould in the shower head  and tap head. The water is dirty yellowy colour and the shower doesn’t drain out water properly hence the shower gets flooded when you shower. The sealant and grout have all turned  brown. The bathtub have turned brown. and the room have a mouldy smell. Toilet is so dirty and not properly cleaned. Something needs to be done about the facilities at this hotel cos it’s not worth the amount that is been charged at all. If there’s anything like a zero star that’s what I would rate this place. Please save your money and go somewhere else don’t be deceived by the front building. Although I must admit that Joyce and Vivian at restaurant are amazing

Review Title: Best place to be in Lagod
Review Text: Had a wonderful time in this hotel. First of all the whole team in the hotel is happy and ready to help. They regularly ask if I require any support or if there is anything that can be done to make my stay more enjoyable. They have a beautiful 25 m long pool. The gym which is well equipped is open 24/7.  They have a buffet for breakfast with a wide range of options eggs, fruits, pastries, local food, European food, Indian food, a variety of cheese, coffee and large option of teas.  Fast check-in and check out. Clean and comfortable rooms.

My 2nd visit in year, staff is friendly. But need to be more alert and active, like this time I ordered salad, it never came and was added to bill. Bathrooms need more maintenance. More options in food menu.

Beautiful location and wonderful staff. Lots of places around to visit and eat. The food at the hotel restaurant is actually good and the breakfast buffet was nice.  Cons: Once nice facilities, now poorely maintained. The shower was clogged, toilet had water stain and we were given old towels. The bed made noises everytime we got in.   Overall, I'll say it's not worth the rates they're charging.

Review Title: My day out at the Blu
Review Text: Booking into the Radisson Blu, Victoria Island, Lagos, was a memorable experience. Away from work, it was relaxing and worth the stay. Courteous staff, clean and friendly environment, and ambience so pleasing.

Fantastic service delivery.   The Guest relations officer and the receptionists rendered to me, excellent services. The food was great, the breakfast was my highlight! A lot and very good!! I will visit again.

Just as was highlighted in the questions  came a candid  response showing how i felt. i had a wonderful experience all round  from the rooms to the food to the personnel and would hope to return again for another experience. thank you

As usual, I was not disappointed. Everything from the check-in speed which is still the fastest I've seen anywhere, to the clean room with thoughtful details. In that room, I felt like I was in a bubble shielded from Lagos. It was a good escape. The food was good and the staff were friendly and helpful.  My wife would have wanted a pillow menu like they have in Radisson Kigali. We would have liked for their pool to not be so visible; I just feel watched. That's about the only major thing that irks me about the chain.  Overall, always a pleasantly Blu experience.
Review Text

Review Title: Excellent place, good and friendly staff!!!
Review Text: We had a family get away here Dec 31st -January 2nd 2023. Great staff, friendly and professional, always looking out for ways to be of help to guests. My wife enjoyed the meals! The room was well made and clean and services prompt. Ifeoma was fantastic with checks to ensure we were alright and also for feedbacks for improvements!  There was a bit of crowd at the check-in but I guess was because of the season. Could be improved to reduce guests waiting time.

Nice hotel with friendly staffs.especially   Miss Ifeoma was exceptional professional and was able to solve my problem with the room.and gave me. Feel to like it hotel with her professionalism. Big up to her.

Impressive hotel with excellent customer service.  The lagoon view from the bedroom was very therapeutic and the bedroom set up was impressionable.   Location is great easlily accessible to every where on the lagos Island. Will definitely  be back and will recommend to friends and family.

Review Title: Exceptional Place to Stay for a trip to Nigeria
Review Text: The staff was amazing. Very friendly and always asking how our stay was.   Ordered room service several times and they ended up refunding us saying it was complimentary, which was very honest of them.  Would highly recommend this hotel.

Nice stay. Had no issues and the waiters were so professional and understanding in the discharge of their duties.  I noticed that there is a gift pencil for notes, however if it could be changed to a pen, it would be so nice.  Food was excellent as well. Keep up the great job!

My experience at Radisson was top notch. The room service, even though I didn't get toothbrush in my toon and slippers. But it was a good experience. The food at the restaurant was top notch. In summary, I enjoyed my stay over there.

My experience was a top notch with a serene environment, well controlled ambient temperature. The services rendered were second to none even when attending to multiple people simultaneously. It is a worthwhile experience.

Overall it was a comfortable stay, the hotel is well situated for access to Lagos Island main business centers. Security at the hotel is very good and much improved from previous stays.   I find the service a bit hit & miss, in particular checkin and check-out is a lengthy and not a friendly process. Process for recognizing and applying their loyalty program benefits is convoluted (even as a VIP) apparently.  Staff at the bar and room service often good, restaurant service can be a little slow but the food is generally good.   Rooms are a good size, clean and generally well serviced.

This is very good hotel at very good riverside location. Having riverside restaurant and bar. Gym,  business lounge available  with other amenities as well. Rooms are spacious and cleaned.   Negatives: Sometimes reception staff is not attentive and cooperative which I have noticed in the past stays. I asked staff for check in but they told that room is not available but at the same time they were offering the rooms to others came later. Due to such incident we were forced to wait for 3 hours.  Another time I have asked for early check in as my flight arrival timing was in morning. I requested to reception team for early check but it was not only refused and staff asked me for one day  charges.

My Stay at Radisson was very enjoyable. Nice scenery. Very comfortable bed.  Large varieties and delicious meals. Staff were all professional and helpful. I will love to return again, very suitable also for the family. I recommend Radisson Blu Anchorage Hotel, Lagos.
Review Text

Radisson Blu hotel VI is always a great place to visit. I had a very good time. The restaurant was on point. I expecially like to visit the VIP lounge next time I am around which will be very soon this year

It was such a great  time at the blu vi, right from check in to check out. The attention to details, suggestions made right before I can can figure them myself not forgetting how helpful Ifeoma was, called to check on my wife who was under the weather and offered to call a medical personnel if we needed any....overall thank you to the team,it was a great one!

My stay was excellent! Food was amazing, the room is really comfortable and clean. The waterfront is so great to look at and the pool gives an even more refreshing feeling. Location is quite friendly and I totally enjoyed the my time here. And a special kudos to peculiar and Ifeoma, they are exceptional!

I stayed twice in 2022, coming to Lagos for business. Strongly recommend. Rooms are very spacious and clean, with a coffee machine which is very important for me :) Food is very tasty, hotel staff very kind.

Review Title: Nice hotel, but beware of the stairs!
Review Text: It was a lovely hotel, definitely not a (five star hotel but a solid 4 star hotel. Very attentive staff. Injured myself on the steps between the lobby and the sunken bar. Just stepping back to walk outside and since the steps are not well demarcated, lost balance twice on the steps leading to the bar resulting in an Achilles injury. The lounge was very disappointing. The good selection was abysmal and the temperature of the hot foods was not great. It has the makings of a great hotel. Hope it continues to improve.

My go to place in Lagos Nigeria.   Get a room with lagoon view.   Worth the price. Great customer service. All the staff are friendly and helpful. Always have a smile  And the buffet breakfast 🍳 is worth it

I had the best time at the hotel… Ayo at the desk  was exceptional, always smiling and willing to help…. Ikotun was also amazing… Beatrice was super sweet, ifeoma and Joyce from guest Relations made me feel so special… Lanre the house keeper was always willing to help me with anything I ask for and so full of smiles and so friendly…. Akin, kelvin, the lady chef at the breakfast  buffet and all the restaurant staffs were so professional…. The OTS service attendants were so nice and very swift with their response… in a nutshell I enjoyed my stay… it was my birthday over the weekend and I chose the right spot for it…. I’m definitely coming back this December for another staycation…. Thank Radison Hotel Anchorage….. the love was indeed overwhelming…..

The room size is small. Not enough cupboard space. Bathroom also very small. Did not provide bedroom slippers or a gown. Noise level was unacceptable. Food was good. Staff was generally professional. An average stay!

This is a beautiful hotel and I must say that I enjoyed my stay at the hotel. Room was okay, clean and the food was tasty as well. Amazing staff who are ready to help always. I am definitely coming back to this hotel.

The view is great, staff are really helpful especially Ifeoma who was very nice and assisted . Meals  are quite tasty too and the location is friendly. It’s quite secured and serene, will definitely return
Review Text

This was a top notch hotel experience. The best components were the room, the food, and the staff. a big shoutout is deserved to Victor and Reuben. They got the little things right in this experience. The shower had high water pressure and perfect temperature control. The room felt cool. They brought in hot towels regularly. Additionally, the food and staff were among the best I’ve ever experienced at a hotel.

Overall a great experience. Already recommended  to a friend.  The staff were very engaging,  pleasant and present to help. The ambience was great. The meeting room was big enough, no technical  issues.  Will definitely  go to Raddisson  again.

Courteous staff, very professional. The Sunday lunch buffet was a real treat! My main concern was the location of the hotel right in front of the highway. That requires extra vigilance if you're driving.

Beautiful property, clean and safe. The rooms were spacious, the bed and linens comfortable. The food and bar were awesome. Just a grand time. The staff is top notch!! The gym and pool were nice additions and the free bottled water at  reception was a great touch.

Review Title: Wonderful staff at this centrally hotel in Lagos
Review Text: I have had the pleasure of staying at this property several times, usually for a  duration of a week or more.  Anyone familiar with Lagos knows the pace of business, the traffic, and general hustle, that is unequalled outside of New York.  What makes staying here so special is the care you receive from the time you check-in, through to the folks that clean your room - everyone here makes you feel like you are in a smaller boutique hotel. Special shout-out to Peculiar Ambah, a server on the outdoor patio who has gone beyond in every interaction this trip, thank you!

Review Title: My Fab August Which Ended Too Fast!⌛🔥☹
Review Text: My friends and I checked in on the 28th of August, 2022, a Friday evening to be precise which was unforgettable. Every aspect of breakfast was YUM! The room was NOICE, but the king size wasn't KINGING! The pool experience was a million shades of GRRR, and the D.J understood the assignment.💯Front desk personnel (Kunle/Tunde- not sure about the name, but he's Yoruba) was exceptionally warm and helpful. We will definitely be back.⌛

The front office and reservations office are very welcoming and open to assist the guests and finding the suitable solutions. The hotel locations is perfect for business trip to avoid westing time in traffic.

Good location for business trip on VI, there was the added detail of welcome fruit platter, wine and card form the manager. Lovely rooms and ok bathroom, only issue was temperature of the water in the bath, that of shower was ok though.

My trip is great, I loved the ambience, staffs were friendly, the breakfast was such a delight, rooms are comfortable and the view is so beautiful. In general my Experience was great however service could be more swift especially at the room service .

Review Title: The best staff and a great atmosphere
Review Text: I spent 1 week here and everyone I met were so polite and friendly. The staff remember you and really treat you as a part of their family. The hotel itself feels like it's a resort with the pool area (spotless) overlooking the water. The gym has the essentials (with a barbell) and is surrounded by nice plants. The decor is great. The food is amazing and buffet is available everyday with a range of options/changes throughout the week so you dont get bored, I had the buffet everyday just coz there were so many options).  A big shoutout to Beatrice working in the in-house restaurant and her colleague, I believe her name started with an A. They really looked after me and were genuinely happy to see me everyday.  Shower could do with a little more power but was always hot so that was
Review Text

Radisson blu is a nice place for family, friends and business visit. The room service and those at the restaurant are exceptional. The hotel is finely located for easy access to other parts of Lagos. Nice place

We deicide to try a different routine for the weekend.  Lovely hotel, breakfast was beautiful and the kids loved it, the rooms are quite comfortable and the pool was refreshing. I would say staffs are really helpful.

My stay at radisson was perfect! I loved the ambience, food was just okay and the room was comfortable. However, my highlights was when I requested for an iron and the lady called back and asked to put my clothes together for complimentary ironing as the iron were indisposed I think….. Ifeoma immediately picked my name, made sure I received it and I met her during breakfast not sure how she noticed but she came and asked if she could help that she saw me looking around and suggested a coffee (capccino ) which was the best coffee I had…. May I add that she figured out my name?.. I know it’s nothing out of the ordinary but I was really comfortable and cheers to the rest of team too.. you guys have won me!

Was largely a good visit, was there for 2 nights. Meeting room and food were stellar; still getting thumbs up for that. Room was musty, got an upgrade - better can be done in this area. Generally good staff.

We visited over the weekend and it was great, the food was nice, staffs are helpful, the view is so beautiful and I felt quite safe as the security were up and about. Not forget the cocktails, very nice!

My stay at your hotel was quite comfortable which is usually hard for me but it was different this time and I enjoyed the meals too. The staffs are quite helpful and the night view is so great, kudos to the Blu family

Had a good time with your team. The reception was great,  I love the fact that attention was paramount,  my requests were fulfilled and the food was amazing especially the breakfast. The view is beautiful you can say it gives the Maldives vibes!

It was even more exciting for me to be here. I love the services, breakfast, the comfort of the rooms, the quietness and Internet not forgetting the gym.... It was well equipped and the pool is refreshing too... Loved every part of this visit to the hotel!

My experience at Radisson Blu Anchorage was great, the service was great and welcoming right from the reception to the staffs at the restaurant to the housekeeping team. I just wanna say thank you for making me comfortable and not feeling the stress of work I came for... I will definitely return! 😁

My stay was pleasant. Had a great experience, The waterfront view is beautiful and the staff service was wonderful. As with VI, water quality is generally an issue. Notwithstanding, management needs to put in an effort to improve the internal water quality.
Review Text

I did enjoy my stay at the hotel, I have been hearing about it. So decided to give it a go. My best experience was the smart TV, which I was able to connect my mobile device and watch what I oike. The food are good. Fruits amazing, the hotel smells good, security us top notch.

Overall, my stay was pleasant and I felt very safe. However, I believe the water quality can be improved as I though the water was not clean, and the color looked amber which was worrying. The ambience is beautiful, staffs were very nice and professional. I loved the courteous attitudes of every security guard and receptionist.  Lastly, I would recommend to have POS machines updated and also ensure the automated machines works to make financial transactions easy for guests.

Had a wonderful time vacationing in Lagos with a touch of BLU. Great services, experienced and very friendly staff made it an exquisite home away from home. Hotel is well located with easy access to everything you need, security is tight, amenities are state of the art, dining was classic with all the local touch and my room had an amazing view of the Lagos lagoon. The attention to details is what thrills me the most, with staff members continuously striving to improve and give an even better experience. Thank you Radisson BLU Anchorage Hotel Lagos, I will surely be staying many many more times again and again.

Good value for money, friendly staff, perfect location, looked after us well. Good value for money, with clean rooms. Was able to get a good nights rest, and felt refresh every morning. Will stay here again on my next trip

Reservation 43416516- I was due a refund  on checking out. The hotel officer at the desk claimed no access to money and that it will be refunded to my naira account. I have written severally to the hotel since but no joy. This is now over one week. I think this is poor customer service from the hotel. I will ask anyone checking out to ensure they get their dues before they leave the hotel otherwise a struggle.

Tried Radisson to get a different feel. It was nice in general, the service is good, staffs are helpful, the location of the hotel is perfect and the lounge was awesome and i got to read some books. Mission accomplished!

My kids really enjoyed their time here especially the medium sized fluffy pancakes. The restaurant staffs are nice as well as the receptionists, we felt really comfortable and it was a smooth stay in general.

My stay was okay, I enjoyed the breakfast and as well my gym time. However, On my second day I had an encounter with one of the security guy, it was embarrassing and displeasing as the guy was pestering and asking where I was going like I could not afford a night here. It was very demeaning but thankfully a lady intervened (was too pissed to remember her name) but she was good, managed the situation even checked up on me the next day it was thoughtful but I did not see her while checking out, I think she said guest Officer or so.

It is a beautiful time in lagos as we decided to take this visiting during their school holidays. It was a great a experience even though we were delayed a bit at checked in. The restaurant staffs are really nice and I think Ifeoma made quite an impression as she kept updating us till we checked in and even called us the next morning... We felt really at home and the kids warmed up to her, Thank you radisson!

I had the best experience, the room was clean and love the view too. Top notch service, amazing food and I felt very secure all through my stay with my family. I will give it 10 stars if possible because it deserves more
Review Text

Being warmly welcomed at the reception with an exceptional friendliness to ensure you're okay.  Room cleanliness is apt with attention to details. Room amenities was great.  The lagoon view made my stay more rewarding.  Wish for more varieties for breakfast

Thank you for hosting me! My stay was good and comfortable. I was impressed by the level of security. Clean Rooms. Friendly staff and prompt service as well.  Good fresh food and every works perfectly. Safe and secure

All good in general. Nice room, view, staff specially Godwin. Good location for managing the traffic jam in Lagos. The business lounge is also a great experience. You can enjoy the water view either from room or in the restaurant. The breakfast buffet is also great.

Asides the fact the water in the bathroom was  not in the bathtub side and was too hot in the  shower. So I could only use the shower cubicle. I think this needs to be fixed. Otherwise, this is a very good hotel, and the services are good

The hotel is well located and the Staff I interacted with were very helpful. The Room was clean and the Room facilities worked perfected. It is a Nice place to stay. The Complimentary Breakfast was good and has varieties to select from.

Very good I will like to be there next time  perhaps Radisson Blu is one of the best hotel in Lagos Nigeria, because when I get there is like home from home, they're well compose, Everyone staff are doing there work perfectly

Review Title: Lovely hotel, great view, warm staff
Review Text: Really enjoyed my stay. Lovely view of  the  lagoon. Kids had a great time. Staff were very warm and attentive to the kids especiallyat therestaurant. Giving a thumbs-up to Beatrice!. Would definitely come again. The bathroom needs some more work though. Well done to the team.

Very nice hotel indeed. Clean, service was excellent, staff were super friendly and the general experience was superb. The hotel is situated right on the lagoon, so the views were excellent. The food (esp breakfast) can be better though.

My stay at Radissson was quite an experience. Staffs are nice, the food is okay as well, however thy could try to manage the hot water line as some of us enjoy our morning bath hot but i I’ll definitely return….

There's calmness and serenity that envelope you immediately you step in into the hotel; which makes you to always want to come back. More importantly, the staff at the restaurant are very courteous and dutiful.
Review Text

Few things need to be taken care off, Pls. like better flush area with hand shower, water colour was yellow sort of, which pissed me off, also various spots where water got collected in bathroom, internet was poor.

Review Title: Great location but damp and noisy construction was really bad
Review Text: Location is excellent and service levels pretty good.   Main problem is the damp. You can really smell it in the corridors. Also construction works going on all day from 8am.   Check out was bad with them not being able to give itemised invoice.   I got charged but have no idea how they arrived to the amount. They promised to send by email but no it has not arrived.   Fairly disappointed overall.

I hosted my Dad’s birthday at Radisson Blu. I was really impressed with the level of customer service and food. The F&B manager-Ramesh was really helpful to ensure a pleasant and memorable experience for my parents.

The securities were quite helpful because I went with the map and I landed at the exit gate rather than the entrance, the halls are neat and we'll arranged. Nice ambience in general moving forward I'll be here for business

The hotel is really nice and up to standard, employees are friendly. They give a warm welcome and treat you like a king. The rooms are very clean and accommodating.  Nice breakfast and bar the view is awesome

Review Title: Great location, good breakfast, comfortable bed, bathroom needs some maintenance though
Review Text: A great Weekend trip to the beautiful and wonderful rainy Lagos. Radisson SAS Anchorage was a pretty good hotel. It has a great location in the heart of Victoria Island. I would love to visit again!!!

I can’t get over how impressed and surprised I was with the room layout. It was different and I appreciated the fact that the bathroom and closet were not the first things we saw when we walked in. I love how secluded the rooms felt. Unlike a number of hotels in the city, you really don’t hear people from the other rooms. Food was good but  presentation could be better.  Staff were pleasant and helpful. We were indoors mostly because of the rain which isn’t such a delight for children. It’ll be nice to have an indoor activity space for children.

It’s overhyped, it was my birthday I told the concierge or  whoever when I got there to check in , didn’t even bother acknowledging, my friend checked in at marriot  this year for her birthday, told them and they gave her a small slice of cake and non alcoholic wine just to make her have a good day , raddision did  absolutely nothing not even acknowledge for a hyped hotel , breakfast was just ok too . However the  standard room was really good but they probably should switch cleaning agents to get a glossier finish for the bathroom

Review Title: A good safe hotel, located centrally
Review Text: Overall this hotel is very good. It is well located for the main business region in Lagos, despite the Lagos traffic. Positives - 1. Excellent overall service 2. Very friendly staff willing to help without expectation 3. Clean with good facilities A few minor negatives -  1. Very slow room service 2. Very slow restaurant / bar service, especially outside 3. More fresh fruits & cereals for breakfast

We decided to stay at Radissonblu Ozumba and I must say it was one good decision. The staffs are homely and they sure have a way with their  guests, the welcome drinks was quite refreshing, thank you from my family and I
Review Text

Loved the ambience, the Friday night at the outdoor bar was quite entertaining and the staffs are quite up and about, it was memorable that most I came in contact with remembered my name and I felt at home. My friend says hello to Ofeoma

Overall greaat experience, meals are nice, The rooms are comfortable but might pass as overpriced, The staffs are hospitable but quite strict with the mask rule. However, I would say i got a good sleep which is paramount to me.

The hotel is in a lovely location by the lagoon. The room sizes were great, and has a well equipped gym which I was told is open 24/7, but the room prices when I stayed there  was slightly overpriced for the service on offer, compared to similar hotels and facilities globally. I was made to understand that they adjust their prices according to demand and I must have stayed when the demand was really high.

Review Title: I got in at 3:45am after being held up in Abuja for over 6 hours and i still managed to get room service! Very impressed
Review Text: Room was good as usual and service was excellent. Food is great and staff are very helpful. Transportation was readily available and the hotel is well located within the city. The hotel is also well secured.

Its a beautiful hotel and the staffs are quite courteos, from check in to the restaurant. The hotel water view is quite a sight to behold. Ifeoma seemed nice too but i will return and hopefully the standard remains

my visit was quite short but it was memorable as i encountered some personality most especially- ifeoma. She checked on us consistently and always said hi. She was able to manage my check in process. Very friendly and professional I must say, she also called to check if my laundry and tv was fixed.

Had a team event, 36 people, 3days. All went well. Staff very welcoming, willing to help resolve issues - and all with a smile from the Security Personnel to the Front Desk Reps, even the housekeepers. Well done and do maintain this standard. You have won a client for future engagements. All the Best.

Review Title: Excellent price : quality ratio and great location
Review Text: Radisson Blu Anchorage is perfectly located to do business in Lagos. The terrasse along the lagune is very welcoming. Very friendly and efficient service. The room was great for the price. Highly recommended.

Their Breakfast is awesome, just that their varieties has reduced drastically compared to 2 months ago. Customer service is top notch and they’re actually good with feedbacks and making amendments when necessary  Mr Anthony and Miss Ifeoma (Front Desk) are 2 exceptional staff, then Isaiah in house keeping is always willing to listen and make sure you’re happy with your order  The open Wi-Fi System doesn’t make sense though, because it’s easy for one to get hacked so they should look into that. The Security at the entrance should stop profiling female guest, it’s irritating because they make it look like any single girl coming into the hotel is coming to see a man and not resident.  Generally it’s a beautiful place to be and I feel at home when I lodge

Shower water is brown and smelly, food is barely edible and overpriced, wifi doesn’t work, sound isolation is non-existent. Different room assigned than the one reserved. Laundry loses your clothes and then never gets back to you if you ask where they went. Bathtub always dirty. Nowhere near a 5 star hotel.
Review Text

During our stay for the training retreat, we had a serene atmosphere around the class, and the lighting in the class as well as the audio-visual system were working as expected. We had some good meals even though the staff arranging the exclusive buffet for our staff were a bit slow, it would have been nice if the staff were timely and well coordinated. They should be aware of the number of guests in a particular conference hall and plan to cater for same at the same time. The rooms were ok, especially the glass projected view. I wish I was booked in the room with sea-side view like some of my colleagues but it's fine.  Overall it is an amazing experience worth having.

Checkin in and check out process is the most terrible I have ever experienced, took over an hour to check in a group of 5. Old and worn out towels in bathroom. Very busy reception and hotel environment. Response to guests request is absolutely poor

There is lots of room for improvement starting with the quality of furniture to the cleanliness of the water (which was yellow as piss) to the proactiveness of staff to handling medical emergencies of their guests. The staff team practically turned a blind eye and left me to deal with my daughter getting sick from eating breakfast at the hotel.

Had a weekend time out with my partner and it was a great experience. The rooms are modern and neat, staff were courteous and professional, the food was good and the view was excellent. Breakfast is a great addition  - i am usually weary about complimentary breakfast - but this was great. Overall a great place to stay in Lagos City.

Outstanding Service Across All Customer Touchpoints This is a great place to stay with an amazing location and outstanding service from all the staff members going way and beyond the call of duty to take care of the guests. I had stayed in the hotel for close to 1.5 months from Mid March to end of April and can vouch for the customer service the staff provides across all the touch-points. Special mention to Chef Bob and his team who took care of my vegetarian food requirements on a daily basis. Seyi from reservations team was very prompt in her responsiveness. I would strongly recommend the hotel for long stays as they make you feel at home.

Great hotel to balance work and relaxation. I enjoyed the morning walks by the pool, great coffee served (all types) as well as the hotel has a good variety of spots to sit and catch a game of sport. Also liked the fact that I could easily walk down stairs and get a table to do some work and not locked up in my room.

I had a good stay at Radisson. The Staffs were friendly and very professional. The security there was ok - I could see some intelligence being played out. Regarding their food however, it’s ok but they can do better especially for local delicacies. They couldn’t get me poundo all through my stay- maybe tomorrow sha😁!

Stayed at RB after covid gap of two years, service is gotten even better, staff was very friendly and courteous, nicely maintained rooms, and food was really good. The Welcome was nice and warm (I am a Radisson Rewards member) and I was also offered an upgrade. Overall a very nice experience, as always…

Amazing hotel, love the view, service is top class, rooms are neat, big and amnesties are world class and close to all the key areas you want to visit while in lagos.  Gym, spa, pool, food, courteous attentive staff, everything was above expectation. Will definitely return

My overall impression about the hotel is beyond average  and  I would love to  come back. Please add pap and akara to your breakfast menu.  It should also be noted that the towels supplied to my room 337 were old. I complained and new ones were supplied as replacements.
Review Text

My visit to radisson Blue was a another life time memorial one night event for me and my wife. In fact, my wife never stop talking about it. She loves it so much bc we’ve never gone for such in the last 10 years of our marriage. The Experience was wonderful and eventful though iit was just a night.

rooms ok, service excellent, very friendly and nice staff. they made my stay very comfortable. food is good, they have a chauffeur service. perfect for business. I enjoyed my time there with my team.  cheers to the whole team

Review Title: A great place to stay in Lagos
Review Text: A very comfortable and peaceful place to stay in Lagos. I spent a couple of weeks here and never got fed up, bored or frustrated!   Great service, excellent food, especially good sampling of local food, and excellent value.  I look forward to going back again and again.

I enjoyed the services form the staff and room location is great. The security team are very aware and alert. They paid attention to details and are very observant. It was a very good stay and see you all soon. Thank You.

Average location but has friendly staff and team members- no explanation of reservation with priceline as not a guaranteed reservation until arrival plus terrace odor making it inconvenient to enjoy the ocean view location-

Excellent option in Lagos. The hotel is located in a very nice neighborhood with a great view in the lagoon.  The rooms are clean and with enough space. Restaurants are clean and with a big variety of food and drinks to select from the menu. The gym is very well organized with good equipment. People of the hotel are very friendly and keen to help you at any time. Safety is great.

Radisson blu is my choice of hotel in Lagos. Every stay has always been great. The staff remains remarkable and professional at all times  The lagoon environment at night is magical. I'll always come back here  Shout out to the entire staff.

Leisure, Relaxation and short family weekend get away.. I was tired from the convention. Had come into Lagos with my family from Abuja. I needed a place to spend my weekend with my children. To eat good food, comfortable bed and great ambience.  The hotel provided it all. Will come  again. It was a memorable stay

I love radisson blu and I enjoy it everytime I come here. Its actually very relaxing and calm environment and they have amazing staffs. I would like to appreciate Diana for been patient and answering all our questions calmly

I had a nice evening with Radisson…. They had this calm and soul music at the business lounge which was lovely and there was a guy who always made sure we had a great time and it was cool. I would definitely come back
Review Text

I actually came here to have fun with my Family and I sure did…. We played lot of games like swimming and indoor games and there was a nice lady who showed us around and I get to find out there’s a lovely spa downstairs…. Mom and I (name of the spa) you can get everything you need in this hotel

Great view of the lagoon. Relaxing and calming.  The business lounge is quite unique, I like their renovation, it’s so beautiful…. I could literally stay here for a year because it feels like home to me 🥰😍

It's a beautiful hotel and  I am also glad that the service is up to standard and not just a name. The food was tasty, rooms are comfortable, it's clean and peaceful. The kids aren't left out as they were able to practice their swimming. Ifeoma was really helpful as she went out of her way to get the kitchen to fix something out of the menu for my kids, thank you for the experience , will definitely return!

Review Title: Good place but work in progress
Review Text: Good place. I enjoyed my stay. I loved the room - spacious & clean, nice view of lagoon, beddings ok, towels clean and essentials e.g. shower gels, shaving stick and shoe polish are all in place. Staff are courteous and professional. Janitors well behaved and always smiling. Food is good - more of continental. So do local cuisines equally too. Apart from a delay in checking in and a lukewarm bath water (i think heating system is faulty), stay was pleasant.

My wife has been asking to stay out and it happened that our home was been renovated and we chose to stay at radisson for a few days.... I must say it was the best decision of our 2days and momey well spent even thou it wasn't cheap. The rooms are so comfortable, the view from our rooms almost feels like we're in Maldives 🤗😁. We also enjoyed the brunch, awesome experience! We will definitely make a return with the kids...

Review Title: Run down, overpriced, poor food quality, cold shower, hotel has a towel crisis and incompetent staff
Review Text: Worst hotel stay ever, The place in run down ( mold in the shower) the food quality is poor, no hot water for the shower, rooms not cleaned during the day, hotel has a towel crisis, you are lucky if you get 1 a day for 2 after numerous calls. Took me over an hour to settle the bill for 4 nights 4 breakfasts and 2 diners, how difficult can it be ? The place is not worthy carrying the Radisson Blu name

Clean hotel, friendly staff, good choices of breakfast, lunch &dinner, love the chocolate drink, will recommend & stay all over again, but need more TV station choices and keep the bathroom off strands of hairs. Had the water view room & loved it

Review Title: Pleasant stay, friendly staff, gorgeous view
Review Text: The location was excellent, both for the lagoon view which offers a good respite from the city bustle, and for proximity to shops, restaurants, nightlife etc. I found most of the staff friendly and efficient, and a couple of glitches I experienced were quickly resolved. Concierges and reservations desk were especially helpful at all times. The decor is on point. I loved how spacious the rooms were. Laundry services were quick and well done. Areas for improvement: As a vegetarian I had very few options although the chefs tried to come up with alternatives, special thanks to Chef Michael. I’d encourage the hotel to offer a wider array of veg dishes on the menu. Also, breakfast seemed to be under-staffed as it takes ages to clear tables when people leave, while new clients coming

Review Title: Sub Par from what was expected
Review Text: Be prepared to wait forever for everything. Check-in takes a long time, not as smooth as some other places I’ve been in Lagos. The food here is awful, I tried many different dishes and all were poor quality and not what one would expect for a hotel of this caliber. Arrived at the restaurant takes exponentially long, the servers will ignore you or walk right past. Apparently there was a leak from a pipe in my room and it was going downstairs so they said I needed to switch rooms. The room I was in was bright and had a decent view. The room I was moved to was dark and out the window was no view at all, nothing but a wall to another building. Staff only left one towel in my room, no hand towel either. Some of the staff were nice and helpful but I would say that was just a few. For

They have a very friendly and professional staff. The food is good and the ambience overlooking the lagoon is great too. I got good value for my money at this hotel. They also follow all the covid guidelines, their breakfast menu is a bit limited but still good food all in all
Review Text

Generally, my review is mixed, because there were certain elements that were really poor (like the water coming out of the tap being coloured, the glass window being dirty) but then there were other elements that were really good (the sitting area by the glass window overlooking the Lagos Lagoon and the food).

Review Title: A most serene and memorable stay
Review Text: We had the best time staying here. It took a lot of researching and convincing for me to decide on this hotel and it was well worth it in the end.   This was a surprise wedding anniversary and birthday trip and it worked well in the end. On request, the hotel decorated our room specially and presented us with a free gift on the house to celebrate.   The rooms and facilities are just as described. Loved the pool/Lagoon view.

Great services from the front desk staff, housekeeping staff, security team and the restaurants team. They staff were really helpful. Especially Bello Ismail and the Night shift staff that worked on Saturday Feb 12th, 2022 at the front desk.

It was the perfect location which provides for both formal and informal meetings. enjoyed my stay. All the facilities were kept clean and they were very aware of COVID health regulations which was a plus

We were extremely impressed by the services and facilities. Everyone was friendly and willing to assist throughout our stay. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to Lagos - certainly the best one I’ve stayed in and absolutely great value!

Review Title: Staff who welcome you like you're coming home.
Review Text: The reception, security, and housekeeping staff really are what make this hotel excellent! They greet and smile at you as if you are returning relative. They really are exceptional!  The overall decor is modern and attractive, though some things are showing their age. Windows, taps, and AC often do have issues, though they are usually fixed very quickly if you highlight them.  The restaurant and deck area are comfortable and the menu is tasty (buffet breakfasts are excellent). A la carte food can be very slow, though.   Overall a great place to stay.

Review Title: There is a need to improve on the cleanliness and air-conditioning of the corridors
Review Text: The experience was great, but there was a persistent odour of dampness in the corridor on the second floor. Dehumidifiers should help. Again, you may consider smoking locations for your guests upstairs. I rate the bathrooms to be excellent especially with the choice of toiletries provided.

The staff at the Raddison was lovely and welcoming when I arrived till the day I left. Great location as the pool is overlooking the lakeside,It was a bittersweet moment when I was checking out.  I will definitely be back soon. Deborah xx

I want to thank a lot Ms Aminat for all help, her kindness and cleverness from my name and name of my Director! If Director of Aminat is reading it - please give her bonus ;)  With kindest regards, Yulia, Kyiv, Ukraine,

Kindly improve on staff training. The front desk staffs were unprofessional throughout my stay. I wasn’t treated as a member. My reservation was altered. The staff that checked me in was quite unprofessional. His name is Christopher Efiok.
Review Text

If you are looking for luxury accommodation good food and friendly staff this is the place to stay . We came here after our Airbnb and I almost wish we stayed our entire trip . This hotel is clean well kept with a beautiful pool can’t wait to come back .

Hotel is unkept and no value for money. Will not recommend Radisson in Victoria Island to anyone. The food is complete rip-off given some outstanding hotels in Lagos charge far less. Same goes for the rooms. The rooms are the worse, it’s just rip-off!!!

Radisson blu Anchorage is one of the best hotel you can ever be, it has a great view which is the lagoon view and the food, omg it’s absolutely amazing. Radisson blu is beautiful I would recommend it for everyone

The hotel is beautiful and also love the fact that we could see the sea and it gets really breezy at night, the food tastes great, pretty artworks on the wall and great services. I would recommend the hotel

The food is tasty, the city view isn’t bad but I would have preferred the lagoon view, the room is very great and comfortable and o really do enjoyed my stay, I would recommend it for everyone who. Thank you

I love it here, the rooms are cozy and the ambience is very nice. The smell of the environment is quite unique and I love the taste of the food. I love the lagoon view and the pool side, I would recommend this hotel for everyone

I love here, the view is lovely and the breeze is great, coming here always makes me feel very good and I would recommend here for everyone mostly the pool side with the lagoon. I love it here. Great service too

I love the hotel and the food is very is tasty, good customer service and great security. I love the service of Mr celestian and the help of Diana. Great hotel. I would recommend it for everyone that comes

I love it here, the food is tasty and the view is marvelous. I love it here. The pool is connected to the lagoon view and in my room you can also see the lagoon view, I would recommend this hotel for anyone

I love this hotel, the pool is great and from the pool you can see the lagoon view which makes it marvelous and nice to swim, I love the food and the hotel room, the cocktails is special. I would recommend the hotel
Review Text

Pleasant Stay, I enjoyed myself, Everything, was perfect. The little issue I had with my Tv, was fixed immediately I notified them about it.  Clean room, room service was exceptional. Food was delicious also.

Great hotel and an excellent lounge. Perfect place to have your meetings with good Intenet and nice environment. Godwin the lounge personnel is a star. The hotel has a nice gym and good restaurants. Great

While visiting Lagos we decided to treat ourselves to a relaxing stay at this VI hotel.  Previous reviews gave us comfort as we planned our stay.  Arriving from the airport, we contacted the hotel via email to ask about shuttle service.  12,000n was a great rate and they confirmed via text.  The driver arrived (a little late because he was at the wrong terminal).  That was not a problem.    Covid protocols were in place as we arrived to check in.  We did have a bit of a a problem as we did not have our passports with us.  Luckily we had a copy on our phone and that was accepted.    King room overlooking the lagoon was comfortable and spacious.  Loved the window seating that added to the charm.  Excellent bathroom with a tub and separate shower and toilet.  Bath products

Be very careful with your dealings with the establishment. They will look for opportunity to plunder you especially if you don't take care of your foreign currency payments. After they ask for deposits, they begin to play tricks with your refund.  Avoid them if you can.

I was here for a one-way conference on aviation, so I didn't get to check out the rooms. The event took place at one of the conference halls close to the waterfront.   The hotel is quite big and impressive. It is top quality and quite popular among expatriates. Several of them were chilling in and around the swimming pool overlooking the lagoon. Beautiful ambience. Serene...  Food was quite good...

It is one of the best hotels that I have stayed in. This is going by my great travel experience that cuts across local and international travels, and my staying even in 5 star hotels in the past. They have very clean environment and highly professional staff-amazing staff. The room was very clean and sweet. The security and safety was just perfect.

The room reminded me of one of the best hotels in Berlin, Germany. It is spacious and conducive. However, like what I mentioned to my colleagues, the chairs in the Marina conference room need to be changed. The chairs there do not fit into the standard of the hotel from my perception and my friends agreed with me. The clothings of the chairs looked old and faded.

The food is tasty. The lagoon view is breathtaking. Courteous staff. Welcoming ambience. Well-organized and excellent service delivery. Unique location. Will definitely recommend for other visitors. Cheers!

Nice, Safe and Neat home away from home.   Security and Tourism Regulations conscious Hotel staff.  Able to rally round your needs to make your stay memorable.  Ideal place to be for Business engagement in Victoria Island, Lagos, State, Nigeria.

Radisson Blu is a good place to be any day any time. Your hotel is very close to river bank and I will expect that there will be a constant surveillance by security guards and also professional divers for rescue purposes in case one is drunk or kids falling over board.
Review Text

The food is amazing and the hospitality is top class. Good view of the sea. Family friendly amenities. The children had a blast. Look forward to another visit. Check it out right at the heart of Victoria Island, Lagos, Nigeria.

Every thing splendid , the staff, the food my favorite egusi soap has always been my favorite since my first visit , the staff very polite and helpful when ever you need their attention. The room very cosy

An oasis of calm and comfort amidst the chaotic hustle and bustle in the centre of excellence. The internet here is the best I’ve found in Lagos, it’s fast and stable. I’m looking forward to trying out the pool this afternoon and will have to report back on that.

Good food, good staff reception, good location, tight SECURITY! Good smile and general customer's satisfaction.   Good ocean view that feeds creativity!  Good staff services--- Thank you Seyi (Reservation agent) and Diana (food and beverage coordinator)

Service was awesome and the staff was very friendly and accomodating.  The rooms were clean and the atmosphere was very inviting.   I definitely recommend this hotel for anyone who expects and wants class.

My husband booked the hotel suite for my birthday photos and dinner. The rooms are a good size the food is fair. The pool is nice and the shops on the ground level are convenient. My driver lost my token for parking and the process to leave the property was too  extreme. The were asking that I provide my car documents and pay a fee even though these things aren’t required at check in. They should air out the rooms more often as well to prevent mold. The bathroom lighting in the suites are poor and no universal outlets. The suites need updating. But compared to other hotels in the area I still like this property.

had a lovely time with my family, I enjoyed the view and the pool looked amazing. I'm yet to eat the food but definitely I feel and know the food would be great. The lagoon looks good too. I would definitely come back

I got a good deal with Booking.com for my stay, however as is often the case with Genius deals their was a catch. The staff sorted this out quickly and fairly. I also had an orthopaedic mattress provided. Very good hotel for Nigeria, we usually stay at the Continental, I actually enjoyed it more here.

Very good experience both as a business guest having conference (Business Retreat) and as a family leisure visitor giving my family a short vacation with families of my Team members. It was great get-together and the view on the sofa admiring the Lagoon was an unforgettable experience

Water was brown, room and bathroom were not clean. Room was quite small not worth the price. Customer service at Voyage restaurant was bad, they need more trainings. Unfortunately this stay was such a bad experience and we were not satisfied at all.
Review Text

I love the view and the rooms, I love the food. The view has this lagoon setting which is amazing. The security are nice and friendly and the staff are amazing. I would definitely love to come here next time

This is probably the filthiest "5" star hotel I have ever stayed at in my life. The bathroom has visible dirt that you can wipe and pick up with your hand, the water in my sink has been brown since I arrived 4 days ago and they keep sending an "engineer" to fix it but he is only running the water for 30 minutes at a time.   The hallway carpet is covered in stains and the walls are dirty. The overall maintenance and cleaning at this hotel is non-existing. I would not recommend anyone to stay who is normally accustomed to true 4/5 star hotels.   This is truly a 2 star hotel with a nice lobby. That's it

Beautiful place and in a very amazing location... the sea side is lovely, the service was great. I’ll definitely spend time again here. It’s a nice place for couple, family, business etc. Had an amazing time.

Really enjoyed my stay. Top class service. Food was great (although jollof rice needs to be richer and more nigerian), service was solid. Enjoyed the Lagoon view and pool. I also appreciated the health and safety measures put in place considering the challenges with the pandemic.

I really enjoyed my stay, its indeed a beautiful place to be with. I have fun while relaxing at the lagoon view section, i would appreciate it if the hotel change their type of songs, aside that its a great place to be

A nice, sweet place to be. i’m talking about top notch place, i honestly love the place and i’ll love people to come and stay their when they are in nigeria. food standards are excellent. i love the staff very nice and friendly mostly a girl called Diana, she has a good manners of approach and respectful. thank you ill be back again

I’m absolutely in love with this place, in the evening is very beautiful and lovely, it has this chilling vibe that would make you want to stay all night then the food is excellent. I love the way the front desk are very effective

I had a wonderful stay overall, although I registered some complaints about the water for the first 2 days of my stay, but asides that I had a wonderful time. I would also love to recommend (although I wouldn't know) if the hotel have like a mini pharmacy within the facility, rather than having to go outside to get medications. Or even a sick bay where first aid could be administered. Thank you.

I really like this hotel and I also like the great view you get. The service is great and the people working here are very kind.  There are many things to keep you entertained like the pool, gym, hans and rene which is a bakery. It's very nice and I recommend staying here.

Raddison Blu has a great service, with a very friendly staff. My favorite part is that they have a great view of the lagoon and the city. With a large variety of food choices, I have been extremely pleased, as I am able to try something new everyday. This is a great hotel for families and for vacations!
Review Text

Review Title: The hidden gem on the island
Review Text: The hotel bounced backed from COVID19 lockdown as the epitome of service excellence. It’s attention to detail is phenomenal. Raza and his team have effortlessly combined safety with enviable service,  in an industry that is struggling.  Raddision blu Anchorage Victoria island is the new kid on the block to benchmark against.   I will recommend it 5 star for service and customer management

A great view, fantastic service clean room and good food. Good showers and large TV.   Freindly staff and areas for meditation especially by the pool.  Can't wait to return when I next come to Lagos next year.

I had a surprise welcome gift in my room and all the staffs were very friendly. The business lounge on the 3rd floor was so nice. I enjoyed the pool and gym. The Sunday brunch was another amazing from the life band to the delicious local and continental dishes. I will definitely come back in the nearest future. Thumps up to all the great team.

Good hotel. I like the location and neatness. the staff were friendly. the security team were friendly also. i stayed for few days and the friendliness improved with time. I will recommend the hotel to others.

Review Title: Lovely waterfront hotel all amenities included
Review Text: The Radisson Blu Anchorage Hotel is located in Victoria Island, Lagos. It is a beautiful and well maintained hotel equipped with all the modern amenities. It is a tad pricey for a budget traveler like me but since I was on a business trip, I found it worthwhile.

Turnaround time for House Keeping, Laundry, Room Service etc improved immensely. Thanks to the effort of Anthony, Chima and Angela at the Front Desk.  The Restaurant Team comprising Chefs Samson, Esther and John as well as Waitresses - Ifeoma, Rakayat, Angela, Dumebi, Vivian, Godwin and Sanni are awesomely homely.  Big thanks to Wellington Mpofu.

I had a wonderful time at the Radisson Blu Anchorage Hotel, VI Lagos. I had an issue with my reservation and the staffs were very attentive and show genuine willingness to help. The only recommendation would be response time for the Room service and Housekeeping team.

Review Title: Good hotel but more attention to detail needed
Review Text: The hotel is pretty and looks modern. They also have a nice infinity pool which overlooks the sea. Their food tastes good, and I enjoyed the complimentary breakfast which had variety of foods. The downside is, the staff hardly pick phone calls when you call the reception or concierge. Also for a 5 star hotel, when i checked in my bags were not carried to the room, my husband & I did that ourselves. The toilet was not well cleaned when we got there, but I pointed it out to a cleaner who did justice to it. I am giving 4 stars because we expected more attention to detail from the staff.

Review Title: Coping with guest challenges in the face of the pandemic challenges
Review Text: Amazing Efforts by the Hotel Management and Staff The consciousness of hygiene, and the need to maintain Covid protocols in the midst of mixed guests, some outrightly unruly, made this hotel PRICELESS

I enjoyed my stay at the Raddison anchorage in VI. The check-in was seamless and As an American travelers, I appreciated Amex POS being available. The staff were always friendly and cheerful and took only a day for all them to recognize.
Review Text

Review Title: My wonderful experience at Radisson Blu hotel
Review Text: All services were wonderful, from my arrival to departure. Great service from the staffs. Beautiful and cosy rooms. Wonderful view. A place for a quick get away. A nice place to relax and just dine and unwind.

A lagoon view hotel that has a great variety of food tob  choose from. The hotel is neat and great ambience. It's located at a very strategic location on the island of Lagos State giving proximity to business spots.

I enjoyed every minute of my stay. The service was excellent and facilities were exceptional. I will recommend this to anyone looking for a memorable getaway experience in Lagos. The lagoon view does magic too!

My stay was pleasant although work should be done on the WiFi. The staff were helpful, they ensured that COVID 19 Protocols are observed. Quite like the placement of hand sanitizers in strategic areas. The room was also comfortable

I planned a weekend getaway with my family and I am happy I choose the hotel. We were promptly checked in on arrival at the hotel. The manager was kind enough to upgrade us to a lagoon view room because of my wife's birthday.  The room was very clean and modern, I understand they just completed renovations. The breakfast was very good with a wide selection of options. I particularly liked the local selection especially the noodles. Overall fantastic experience and can't wait to go back to the hotel.

Home away from home. My children and my wife  love and cherish every moment we spent at Radissonblu Lagos. A wonderful place to stay with an amazing lagoon view. I never thought any Nigeria hotel would have a stunning view. Will surely come back again and recommend this hotel to my friends and business partners

We hosted my Aunty’s 50th birthday and the team was very amazing. The surprise cake, the wine and even the staff singing for her was the icing on the cake. The people can’t be compared with other hotels. We truly felt safe with the COVID measures put in place. We will surely visit again.

Awful service (front desk as well as room service - takes an hour to get even a beer, arrived warm). But nothing tops how dirty this hotel. The room and floor smelt of damp, carpets filthy, sheets tattered and torn, room not cleaned properly, cups etc arrive covered in grime. Even the water coming out of the taps was dirty. Never stay here.

One of the best hotels in Lagos for vacation, office meetings, party's.... Radisson VI always provides extraordinary experience. Nice and humble staff, beautiful location with Lagoon facing rooms, clean environment and great service. Such a homely feeling !

The experience was nice, breakfast was excellent, room was nice, staff were friendly and very professional, check in and out was good but needs to be fast tracked so people don't stand and wait for a longtime
Review Text

Review Title: A place where hospitality is at its peak
Review Text: I was in Radisson Blu Anchorage Hotel VI with my family for a dinner to mark our wedding anniversary, I was surprised at the level of hospitality exhibited by the hotel staff. We had a special cake from the hotel in addition to our dinner, I got a deserved treatment and I will always make the hotel a place to be.

Nice hotel my family really enjoyed there self the staff where good with the service I can't complain really. They really recognise me as they see me, I like that. It my favourite whenever I choose to stay away from hotel. I hope they keep this up

As a regular traveler Radisson blu vi is always my 1st and best choice, it has close proximity to all the nice spots on the island and the view from the lagoon facing rooms is just beautiful. The food is good and security is standard.

Spent some days at radisson blu vI, the environment is so serene and I got hospitality at its best. From the reception to the restaurant all staffs were very friendly and fantastic and giving out quality service. Beautiful place to be.

Personal trip - was for our  birthday  We had a dinner planned plus just sitting by the waters and enjoying the night scenery. The location was perfect and the facilities was worth the while. Generally a good trip

I enjoy my stay at Raddison VI Lagos expecially the water view and the friendly of the staff, I also enjoy good food and touch of smile from the chef and waiters ,will always love to take my family and friend to Raddison at all time of my vacation

The staffs are so undertrained and will refuse to attend to you till tou walk down to meet and beg them. Work on training your staffs more,  after the delay the guy ends up coming with one order and forgot others. It then took another long time to bring the water damn

Fantastic stay so far, first time in Lagos and the hotel is breathtaking, the hotel is clean staff are very professional and friendly. The hotel is very safe and close to the embassy so you do not have to stress to get to the embassy. Nice place.

This is the most beautiful hotel I have stayed in in Lagos, the view of the lagoon is breathtaking, the service from the lagoon view rooms are fantastic, the gym is very spacious with up to date equipments. Loved my stay.

Very professional staffs across all boards. Breakfast was amazing the omelette was brilliant my favorite. The rooms are very spacious and the bed was very comfortable good for my bad back. Going to work wasn’t stressful as radiosonde is at the heart of the island close to most offices in Vi. Use it and thank me later.
Review Text

Came to celebrate my friend’s birthday party at the voyage restaurant, nice selection of meals I personally loved the pepper soup, the view from the restaurant is really nice and service was great. Will be here again.

Stayed a few nights at the Radisson Blu Anchorage Hotel, Lagos, though it is my first time staying at this brand post-COVID. I really enjoyed my stay at the hotel, most importantly the level of service provided by Mrs. Beatrice (Front desk), Mr. Adetoye, Ifeoma, John, Julius, George, and the other baristas (my peacemakers every morning) at the View Bar.  I look forward to returning to Lagos more, now that I've somewhere that feels like home.  Room tip: 239 has a beautiful view.

I always have work trips in Lagos, and for security reasons I always stay in radisson, it has beautiful views and very close to the embassy so I don’t have to stress when going out. For  relaxation always request the Lagoon view rooms.

You guys should just keep it up and maintain the standard. I really enjoyed my stay and my guest didn’t want to leave again. I have to extend my check out time because of my guest. All in all. It was an enjoyable stay for us. Kudos

Good hotel for business trip. Good value for money. Rooms are quite spacious, nice and clean. Buffet restaurant could be improved but still good such as the overall dishes and breakfast.  I really appreciate the room service and the professional of all staff members. 24h surveillance at main entrance.

Came in for thier sunday buffet and ended up sying the night to have a full experience of the hotel, johson at check-in was professional and answered all my plenty questions. The room is decent nicely furnished. Food was ewually nice. And the ambiance was great.

Nice hotel I enjoy myself all through my stay.  Well improve service from the staff. Look forward to staying again as it very impressive with the service and quality of food. And I forgot and item in my room I was call by the housekeeping and front office for.

Great as usual, returning to relax for the weekend and service is still wonderful,  no negative comment here, just keep doing the great work you do your team is awesome and I hope the management appreciates them as we guest do. It’s always a pleasure here.

Been here for a few days and the hospitality is awesome from check in, service at the restaurant Angela was awesome very helpful and friendly. To he pool is very nice and kid friendly.  Food in general is equally great. Nice place to have a holiday.

I stay in the east, came to Lagos to relax for the Eid holidays and stayed at the Radisson, my very 1st time here and it was pleasant. Everything works here and it's just a beautiful place to relax. The gym is  standard if u are a fitness enthusiast like me.
Review Text

I had a beautiful stay at this lovely Hotel, the environment is clean and the view is awesome! The staffs are nice and polite, always ready to help. I'm happy to have stayed here as it was worth every dime!

Came here for my wedding and honeymoon. It was a lovely experience.  My room was nicely decorate with petals and was given a bottle of wine, very thoughtful of the hotel. Spent 6days altogether and it was lovely.

1st time in Lagos and the reception has been awesome. Lovely hotel friendly staff and the food has been great soo far. The view from the room over looking the lagoon is just breathtaking. Will definitely come back here because it feels like home.

Review Title: Hotel that has its guest at heart.
Review Text: Was here for a two day meeting with my team, and I must say I loved my experience, from check in reception was warm and friendly, the rooms splendid good size for a standard room and very clean. The meeting area was equally clean, the meeting was well organised, every request promptly attended to my the team. This is the best place to have your events and meetings.

Spent one night, the room had a moldy/damp smell. the bathroom ammenities are old, have permanent stains, little things like room slippers, bathroom robe and showercap were not available in the room, and the water  from the tap was light brownish.

I always stay at radisson when I come to Lagos the ambiance is awesome the staff and very nice and professional. The security team is so detailed they know almost everyone that walks into the hotel you are so sure you are safe in this hotel.

The ambiance was really calm and serene. It’s a nice hotel to relax when you want to get away from the Lagos stress. Food is good and the facility is newly renovated so everything works well. Will be here again next week.

I visited the hotel on my way back from school cause I was going to be traveling and I needed somewhere to pass the night. The environment was so soothing and relaxing. The services were amazing and so were the staff. The room was so neat and comfortable. I almost missed my flight cause it felt like I was at home and not in a hotel 😂😂😂

I visited with my kids during their holiday and it was amazing. The services were exemplary and the staff were outstanding. We felt so much comfort we never wanted to leave. I would definitely recommend to family and friends as I also can't wait to visit again

This is my first vist to Lagos.The Radisson Blu is like  a sanctuary   Been here for 4 nights Friendly and knowledgeable staff Excellent hospatility ,great food and a superb bar  The bar manager Uche is very efficient and friendly,a real positiv vibe in the bar.
Review Text

Review Title: Great service, Luxurious Comfort & Wonderful View
Review Text: A great business stay! The rooms are modern and well appointed. The view (on the lagoon side) is wonderful. The service is excellent, especially the security and housekeeping staff who great (sometimes by name) every day. The pool is great and the restaurant overlooking the lagoon is a lovely setting. I was grateful for air conditioning too!! Buffet breakfasts are a feast.

All the employees were very helpful and friendly. I came for my birthday and they were kind enough to decorate the room and give me a cake. I was very impressed by the new room decor! Beautiful and modern designs

Good hotel, friendly staff. Very safe and secure environment and the rooms were comfortable. Getting a bit tired now and could do with some sprucing up but the room was neat and tidy. No major complaints and I will definitely use this hotel again

Radisson Blu is a well known, reputable hotel brand, so when I had an opportunity to stay here, I have to admit that my expectations were a bit high.  Being that it is one of Lagos's high-end hotels, and not to mention the fact that it is conveniently located on the famous Ozumba Mbadiwe Street, (in Victoria Island), it is sure to be a frequent favorite of 'well-to-do' Lagosians and tourists alike.  As I usually do, I'll divide this review into 'Merits' and 'Demerits', based on my experience.   PROS: Upon entering the premises, you could clearly see that it was a well-maintained property.  Impeccably manicured flowerbeds and lawns highlighted the exterior of Radisson Blu Hotel.  Hans & René, (a fancy ice-cream & dessert shop) is located within the grounds.  In the lobby, light

took out time to spend with the family. the team was very friendly, willing to help and very health conscious without overdoing it , especially due to COVID -19. Will surely recommend this for families looking for a getaway.

The hotel is about 75% okay Food was good  Reception was great Restaurant staff were biased (they use looks and size of guests to attend to them) Only one baby chair available in the restaurant  Restaurant staff are not proactive

Was at Radisson Blu Anchorage Lagos last December with my wife for our first wedding anniversary. Spent the weekend there and it was a beautiful experience. The rooms were very luxurious and room service were quite professional. Had  a sea food night on Friday and a dinner on Saturday night. For a foodie like me, both were the climax of our stay. Culinary skills out of this world. I will recommend the restaurant for a small group dinner. Response time wasn't fantastic at some times, guess the attendants and waiters are quite overwhelmed. In all it was good experience.

Work on your staff strength especially your number of waiters and waitresses due to the influx of guests in your surface restaurant and also your view bar. It will really help inorder not bring about delays in services and orders.

Review Title: Surface bar experience left a lot to be desired
Review Text: I went to Radisson for Sunday lunch. We called I'm advance and were told we didn't need to reserve a table. After waiting 10 minutes for someone to attend to us, we we told that the buffet section was crowded and there were no seats available, so we decided to sit outside. We had to get someone's attention to give us a table and the staff just seemed really non challant and disorganised.  It was really hot and uncomfortable in the outdoor seating area, with only 3 outdoor fans for all the tables. The waiter was slow, and grumpy. 2 out of our three orders arrived first, without cutlery.  The third order arrived 15 minutes later with the cutlery,  and I queried the waiter. His response was that it was difficult to get cutlery.  The food was adequate, and I found the whole

The staff attitude was exceptional even though I lodged for one night. The night scenery is also awesome not to mentioned the pool also. Their professionalism was top notch. Its a five star to me. Am definitely lodging there anytime I need a hotel accommodation
Review Text

So I visit Radisson Blu Anchorage Hotel between 20th and 26th. From the gate to the inside of the lobby was many protocols.  First I thought this was overload of protocols, but I have to think back and I realise  that they are working base on the situation. Every single service they gave me from the reception, concierge to the restaurant was very excellent  and I love it. I will definitely recommend and visit again.  Regard   Kingsley

The staff were very approachable and helpful. The breakfast and dinner buffet was the best. They arranged for a taxi to pick us up from the airport and then back again at the end of our stay.They went over and beyond to help make our stay enjoyable. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Lagos

We had a 3 night stay to enjoy and were very satisfied with every aspect of the hotel. The staff are very friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable regarding places to visit in Lagos. The hotel was very clean throughout, and our room was spacious with everything that we needed. Breakfast was substantial, and suited all tastes. The hotel is quiet, and is situated near numerous restaurants, and a main supermarket, and within easy walking distance from the Hotel. We would highly recommend a stay at this hotel.

Review Title: Interesting experience will love to come back
Review Text: But was shocked that the online reservation i did was not told that I was not entitled to complimentary breakfast only after paying getting to the hotel was told am not entitled to breakfast please let it be clearly written while boldly when booking online to avoid such embarrassment next time and prospecting costumers as well

Stayed for a weeks. Checkin was very smooth, the room is very clean. Above all the staff are great and polite. Very grateful to Chris the receptionist who is very friendly and helpful. Dinner was really good and nice. But overall. Excellent service.

Great place to be for meetings and hang out with friends especially water views of the lagoon, the Covid-19 protocol were adhered to from the gate security where on point down to the front desk every one on mask. Radisson Blu Anchorage Hotel is a place to be no doubt keep it up.

Great experience at hotel and it is an experience I will live to remember.  The staff are great with great professionalism. Friends and family hotel for superfluous weekend.  Highly a world class hotel with great facilities

First time visiting the hotel and was really impressed. Especially with the covid-19 protocols being implemented at the hotel starting from the security team at the entrance gate to the lobby. The food was very nice,the atmosphere very neat and relaxing. Above all, the safety standards being implemented in the hotel makes the whole experience wonderful because I actually felt quiet secured while in the hotel... Thumbs up.

I had a nice stay at the hotel. The quick and fast response to guest issues drew my attention the most. The security guys are so articulated and professional in discharging their duties. I forgot my phone at where I sat enjoying the view after my business meeting. one of the security staff found it and called my room. They are very friendly and act professionally.

I enjoyed my stay. Will love to be back. Everything worked well. The location was good. The food was good. The receptionists were courteous. The drinks were pricey, but with it. I believe this is one of the best hotels in Lagos.
Review Text

Came to relax with my family for the weekend and it was all I expected and more. Got a nice view of the lagoon, swift checking and check-out nice breakfast options. Security is also top notch here so this is a very safe hotel to relax with your family.

good and excellent service provider to humanity i really enjoy my staying and love to always be there whenever am in Lagos, especially the water view area and the swimming pool are fantastic and marvelous

For the amount of this 3 start hotel you will expect a clean bathroom, a well scented room and a clean lobby. Quite disappointed with the facility, I mean you are only paying this amount for staying in VI and a dirty lagoon view
