It’s a very beautiful hotel price is fair, worth the hype to be honest if you want to relax and enjoy your weekend this is your best option. Beak fast had lots of options and that was nice. Same as dinner all round I will give this hotel 5 stars.

Came to spend the weekend and relax due to the heavy traffic on Saturday, fist time here and I was amazed wondering why I haven’t been here before, check-in was smooth done by a very friendly receptionist, room was very comfortable and neat. I particularly love the smart TV in the room.

It's a beautiful place to visit and their services are excellent. If you are looking for a nice place for leisure, business, family time, personal time, they have got you covered 💯. Will definitely visit again.

I checked in with my family on weekends,the environment was great from the entrance security team observe all protocol of covid-19,we were instructed to put on nose mask and sanitize before entering the hotel. Check in progress was fast and room look fantastic, break fast was great. I love this hotel especially the lagoon view rooms.

Checked into the city view for my first night and loved it extended my stay and got the lagoon view even better. The service here is spectacular, you really don’t need to travel abroad to get five star quality service you will get it here.

Came to celebrate my birthday lived the view and the ambiance, dinner at the restaurant was also very good. Will give this hotel a solid five star for consistency. And another five stars for having a fantastic team.

Service is top quality here, very friendly staffs food is great the view from the rooms awesome, ample parking space for those driving. Now to the rooms I advice you take the pool view very nice especially at night.
Review Text

Been here for some days and I must say I am really enjoying my stay, from the beautiful spacious rooms to the wonderful view of the lagoon. This property is close to the embassy Bonny camp and even the market very nice for tourists and people visiting Lagos for the 1st time. Great food too and nice people.

It was my second stay at Radissonblu Anchorage Hotel with my family and we so much love it.  The first time we stay here was the old room, now rooms have been renovated, wonderfully arranged. The lagoon view is second to none. The food is tasty and the waiters are very friendly and ready to assist.  My high point is the enforcement of covid-19 protocols. This time, we feel very much safe and secured.  Will surely come back again and also recommend this hotel to my colleagues and partners.

What sets a quality hotel apart from merely a place of accommodation are the extra services it offers. At Radisson Blu, they have exceeded my expectation with their Good location, Fast Service, Spacious And Comfortable Rooms, Activities and Recreation Areas. it's a home away from home.!

A moment i will live with forever, Spending 14th February 2021 in Raddison Blu was super exciting and romantic. First of all the Ambience was beautiful,with the Red and white color,the Trumpeter and the Saxophonist who played special romantic songs for myself and Hubby made the day super special.   Talk about the special buffet ...  The Staff very loving set of people.  I had a nice treat at Raddison Blue and i will have a repeat of it over and over again.  Thank Raddison Blue.😊

They checked me to their newly renovated room,the room was beautiful, the housekeeping staff were very professional and friendly,the ambience was very nice .The food was very inviting,I really enjoyed my stay in Radisson blu.i will come back over and over again.The hotel is just value for money.

The experience I got here from the reception to the housekeeper cleaning my room, made me think like the management has invested much in training their staff. Very courteous staff. The lagoon view is very relaxing and I enjoyed it with my son.

I was at the hotel for a 3 days business meeting. The room was very beautiful. I initially got the room facing the road, before the Front desk manager moved me to the water view room. The sight was amazing and the staffs were very friendly. Above it all, our meetings expectations were met. Radisson for me it the place to be. Thanks to the team.

I was to stay in another hotel before a Friend referred me to Radisson Blu citing the newly renovated rooms. I stayed in 2018 and the carpet in the room was looking old. The welcome experience, newly renovated room plus the water view made my stay splendid. I also enjoyed the services at the restaurant. The Blu Berger was very delicious. I will surely return

I had a wonderful stay. From the security to check in and out, it was impressive. The staffs are quick to respond and friendly. The meals taste superb but the view is everything for me. Looking forward to another visit.

If it was possible to give this hotel a zero I would. This hotel discriminates against women, especially single women, they think all women are prostitutes looking for customers. Ladies please keep off this hotel if you don't want to be mistaken for a prostitute. This hotel endangered my life. Never again
Review Text

Coming to Radisson was one of the best choices I and my squad made Everything was just the very best  From the charisma at the desk down to the decor and satisfying glazed dinner 🍴  It’s one word Perfecto 👌

Radisson is a very nice hotel very beautiful, nice  customer service , very beautiful background , great buffet , amazing sea view and beautiful pool,it is a great place to celebrate special occasions.

It was beautiful  It was amazing It was great  It was a very beautiful place ,I went for a friend's birthday dinner party their food is nice and has a nice sea view,.................I like the view thank you

My stay was great and what made it great is the service. Waiters are so friendly especially Efema she is lovely and helpful! The security guards are so friendly that my daughter say hello everyday to them.  The only inconvenience was some minor problem we had in the room, we took two connecting room and the water in the toilets was yellowish and for 2 weeks we stayed it didnt improve...

overall rating is 7,i was not impressed with the room which i stayed. the bathroom shower was leaking, the drainage was bad, after bath, the water stays in the bathroom draining little by little. the Gym was amazing and the hotel service was good.

In spite of currently going through gradual refurbishment programme, this hotel offers friendly and attentive staff, great breakfast, well equipped gym, super waterside restaurant/bar and good accommodation.

Stayed for 2 weeks.  Food is great , the room is very good. All the staff are very helpful and polite. Very grateful to Kate the waitress who is very friendly and helpful. Breakfast is really good and nice. Nothing is to much trouble.  It does take a while for the food to come out sometimes.  But overall. Brilliant.   Thanks

The hotel presents an excellent view of the lagoon and a feeling of tranquillity in the hustle and bustle of Lagos. The staff are very professional and the service offered was beyond expectations. I really enjoyed my time even though in isolation.

I love going here cos its beautiful and the staff there are 100percent friendly. Good food and interior too. You will definitely feel the taste of luxury you pay for. I will be visiting on valentine of 14th of this February too.

We had a nice stay here for the weekend.  They have made a lot of improvements. They have good customer service. I love how professional the staff are and how they smile while attending to you.. I will definitely revisit.
Review Text

Review Title: Always great service. Big improvement in guest rooms
Review Text: Been going to this hotel for 5 years. Service by staff is always exceptional. The team at the front door are always friendly and efficient. The manager Maureen always makes you feel welcome and very  professional. Well done

An excellent stay with my family. Very professional and helpful staff. The new room is nice and my husband really like the changes at the gym. Good breakfast options, I enjoyed the Tborne steak. I will definitely revisit.

It was a wonder stay over the weekend. Pleasant and professional staff at the desk. Swift response from the number 9. New rooms look great and the gym is everything for me. I will definitely revisit, nice changes.

The bathroom is not at all clean. The water is brown but that may be a Lagos issue. The shower is really nice, the bathtub is very tiny  Thee breakfast choice is excellent, but the tables are dirty. The covid measures are good. The staff is extremely slow. The security is plenty and very friendly.
I’m impressed with the newly renovated rooms, I had a bad experience during my last visit and returning this time I almost didn’t recognize the rooms. I must commend, the team are doing a great job👍.

Review Title: Poor services at Radisson Hotel VI

Unbelievable!!   The chef is very poor,  they will give you tasteless kids meal for a ridiculous price. unfriendly and ill-mannered staffs who acts like they don't want you there. My overall experience was horrendous, I didn't feel safe here, one of the cleaners even tried to barge into my room without knocking. thank God I had the bolt on. I have videos and pics of how badly I was treated here because i'm  a woman who can afford to pay for 2 rooms to have a

Review Title: 5 Star Hotel with Two Star Services
Review Text: Overall stay was okay. The meals were nothing to write home above, could do with a lot of improvement. The check in and check out time is also another nightmare, the staff are very slow or maybe its the system. The initial room on the first floor was horrible but the one on the second floor was fine although it had some smell. The carpet in the hallway is also very dusty and requires removing as it just habours dust.

The toilet was an old and dirty one ... no floor towels until I requested from housekeeping. It takes a long time for room service/housekeeping/ laundry to respond to request. Food takes like an hour and half with no apologies and the staff have a sense of entitlement

Been here for 5 days now and I must say it is worth every penny,with the scary surge of the  covid pandemic this hotel isn't playing at all when it comes to abiding by the rules, security is on top of this I must give the a hand for their dedication, the front office team From the concierge  to the front office manager have been awesome always there to assist, and the food, I especially love the jollof rice and chicken pepper soup something I always miss when I go back. And the lagoon view is a must.
Review Text

Overall my stay was a pleasant one, I just was not cool with the no smoking rooms and the very poor room service. I ordered for breakfast at 3am and it could not be served. But kitchen said they could make chicken wings and chips which was not value for money and it arrived 2 hours after.

Absolutely outstanding hotel perfectly located. Helpful, friendly staff who go above and beyond to make sure you have the best time. It was my birthday during our stay, which we had not mentioned, but they obviously saw that at the check in. It was a lovely surprise when they left a bottle of wine in the room! Also an excellent breakfast buffet. We will definitely come back with friends and I would highly recommend this hotel.

I was at the Radissonblu Anchorage hotel, Victoria island, Lagos  over the weekend and all I can say is I am definitely coming back with my parents and siblings. It was amazing, the staff always willing to help, the buffet meals tasty and always well set, don't get me stated in the view it always left me breathless each time I looked out the window. My girls and I had a lovely stay and we promised to make it a regular practice to spend our getaway at the Radissonblu.👍👍to the Team you are doing well.

The nail studio was top notch, the buffet set up is one of the best I seen so far with delicious meals,the gym is exceptional and the gym attendant that attended to me on my visit had a very good reception

An amazing stay with my wife on her birthday! The room was decorated with petals and we got cake and wine. It was a great surprise indeed. Very impressive and attentive staffs. I will definitely visit again.

So it was an impromptu getaway with my nephew and sister, I had to pack a few things, was amazed when a staff (Maureen) showed me the new salon around the basement, and some fascinating walk in stores where I could pick some few things I couldn’t get while coming. I love this

Here with my team on a workshop and I must say this is the best service I have gotten Soo far, and I am a frequent traveller and hotel user, yes there are places that needs improvement but the rooms are beautiful, neat and spacious, the food is great, security is top notch and the staff are all wonderful 10 stars here for them. Book the Lagoon view if you want to relax after a stressful day at work. It's even more beautiful at night. The bar outside is also a nice place to relax at.

This particular Radisson Blu outlet is pretty nice. It has great ambience, lovely, modern decor and all other attractions you'd expect to see in a hotel of this stature (gym, pool, restaurants, WiFi and even an ice cream outlet - Hans & Renee). The restaurant by the poolside - Surface Bar & Grill - is a lovely place to hangout with friends and basically enjoy a night out while also enjoying a view of the Lagos lagoon, their menu is fairly expansive and the food is fairly good. The chocolate and vanilla milkshake was substandard but the cocktail was awesome.   On the flip side, there need to be more waiters at the poolside bar, we literally had to go seeking waiters at multiple points during our visit; the wait time for the food also needs to be shorter (especially considering we

I need the management of the hotel to work on the shortcoming highlighted earlier for effective patronage. You should also encourage your staffs because they're doing extremely well and dedicated to their duty and duty post.

Got here early and was given free early check-in, met with a very lovely polite Front desk person (Chima)  who checked me into the newly renovated  room. Room is very nice very clean and of modern design with very comfortable bed, food was equally great. Same as the pool, the service at the bar was quick
Review Text

I was here on a business meeting with my colleagues. It was quiet, coordinated, little or no disturbance, different selections of tea, lovely food display for coffee break and to top it all, excellent service from Barnabas.

The Lagoon view is beautiful, a wonderful sight to behold, though can be hot sometimes (I usually think it should be cold but it's rather hot). The staff, food, COVID measures seen all over the hotel is quite reassuring knowing that the safety of guests and the staff is a priority.

This is the place I visit when i want to relax and have a private time.  I haven’t visited since COVID until last week and I was reminded of the sane and serene environment I usually find myself whenever I visit. The staff, the food, security, all have a very warm reception - friendly and welcoming - it’s my go-to place.

It was a wonderful evening with friends. We just decided to wait out traffic but it turned out to be awesome that we were there hours after the traffic. The food was sumptuous - King Tiger Prawns - and the service staff were courteous. They also had strict rules considering the COVID restrictions which I find really good. All in all, it was a wonderful experience and I would be back.

I love the covid 19 measures put in place by the hotel management. The staff were great and ready to response to my needs. I must also commend the management for the room renovation and the gym as well. The gym guy Amechi was also nice. Great job!

Radisson Blu Anchorage leisures is a great place to be wao maximum security and staff are so on point and attentive, can't wait to visit again with my family. The lagoon view was great and very nice good location.

Came for the weekend with my family for my birthday I was blown away with the decoration in the room, the greeting card and cake, I felt special that the hotel took out time to add a spark to my day. I got upgraded to the newly renovated room, I loved the fact that the rugs are out of the room because I normally have allergies. Breakfast was nice but my favorite is the pizza I am a cheese lover and I was happy the chef blessed the pizza with a lot of cheese. This hotel puts a lot of thought into making their guests happy.

This has got to be the most terrible experience ever...overall poor service..zero hospitality...staffs at Radisson Blu VI needs to go through some trainings on treating people right   ..  .most overated hotel...

Review Title: The poorest hotel experience I've ever seen
Review Text: This was the poorest experience I've ever seen and will never want to recommend or visit there ever again myself. Just 2 weeks of luck down abi curfew this hotel couldn't make the place condusive for anyone

Loved the experience, halima was great very helpful and efficient, took her time to help out and assist  with all we asked for. Food was nice, security team was ok it's a safe hotel and a beautiful  place to take pictures.
Review Text

Been here for a week soo far and I must say service is great, came in late at night and was still accommodated when I left the 1st hotel I stayed in due to bad service. Security  is very efficient, the hotel is very safe and practice very strict  covid-19 safety measures. Food is decent but the new rooms are very beautiful I guess alot of thought  was put in before the renovation started. Great work team.

They had guests smoking weed in tgeir rooms which you can snell when you walk in the corridor of the first floor. Also called back from the gate while diving out if the hotel after checking out cause they said a towel was missing. I dont use hotel towels as I always go with my own.

Review Title: Not as nice as my previous visit
Review Text: Everything seemed fine till I was woken by construction/renovation noises from the room above mine. Rooms aren’t soundproof so this was quite a bother! Breakfast could also do with a few more options.

Radisson blu vi has a nice ambience  Great people, courteous and professional. Breakfast is good and my orders arrived in time.  I would suggest more varieties On the buffet, I enjoyed my stay and would definitely stay here again.

I had a wonderful experience during my stay,it was very thoughtful and sweet of the hotel to have celebrated me. I got a cake and wine with loads of nice wishes, the cake was so nice that I requested to meet with the pastry chef... Kudos to Chef Mayowa👍

The Radisson Blu has a staff that greet you each time they see you!  They are friendly and do not mind assisting you to resolve any issues.  My fiancée and I were treated like royalty.  From Angela, Anthony, Johnson, Daniel and the Manager Maureen;  the were absolutely exceptional.  My room bed linen was the cleanest I have ever seen at a hotel and was changed fresh each day! Towels were brand new and were changed with clean white ones.  The bed was really comfortable and the lighting in the room was more than adequate.    I recommend that if you are traveling to Lagos, Nigeria please check the Radisson Blu out as you will not be disappointed!

I arrived late to the hotel after a long flight, The reception was so wonderful that I really didn't want to go to my room. Their mode of welcoming, communication, addressing, and diction is awesome. Thought I've seen it all till I woke up to a beautiful seaview the next morning. I'm impressed with the service.

First time here and I loved my stay  a friend, the rooms are of a decent size but very clean, the bed has to be my favorite part of my stay because it was very comfortable, food was great loved the buffet, my kids loved the noodles and omelet. The view from our room was very beautiful looking over the lagoon.

It is a really nice place to be, good staff, I stayed at the lagoon room overlooking the pool and lagoon. And I recommend you try it. The food is on point and each food are well served with nice garnishing😍

Review Title: Best Service I have gotten in a while
Review Text: If u are looking for great service come here. The security is top notch,and they adhere strictly to the COVID -19 safety guidelines. Mask on and sanitizer everywhere. The hotel is really clean and currently under renovation but I was fortunate to get one of the newly renovated rooms and trust me it screams class. food is great loved the Blu burger and the chicken wings. Generally a great stay and experience.
Review Text

I was unfortunate to have stayed in the hotel the period of the Endsars protest. I was unable to checkout on the 21st of October due to the crisis in the city and the curfew. I extended my stay for two more nights. Despite this, I felt at home and the staffs were very friendly. The food was nice and the newly renovated gym and pool made me felt relaxed. After I checked out, I got a surprising call that evening from the hotel's Front Office Manager who asked to know if I got to my destination very safe. That was customer service at its peak. It shows that the hotel do care for their guests even after they have left the facility. Special thanks to the entire team for making me feel at home while at the hotel. I will be back again.👍

I have been coming to Radisson VI from day one the hotel opened. Severally I gave my feedbacks regarding the hotel being due for renovation. When I was checked in on the third floor facing the lagon it a wow for me. The next day I went to the gym and the renovation is huge. Its indeed great. Nice one and very courteou team

Went to radissson Blu Vi to spend my wife's birthday before arrival I called just to request for an early checkin to enable us prepare for other activities for the day, but to our greatest surprise they went the extra mile to make it special for my dear wife by surprising us with a cake,wine and beautifully decorated bed with petals and all. It was such a beautiful experience all thanks to the team.food was fantastic,and service was great all round, we even got upgraded to the lagoon view by the very friendly service staff at the desk. Save yourself stress and go to Radisson Blu for all your celebrations you will love it.

For a Nigerian like me who had lived in abroad for so many years wanna come home and have the greatest fun as it can be stressful here. Part of my GOALS was to taste/ eat more of our native/local food such as amala, gbegiri and ewedu with mixture of meats, normal rice and beans, okra, ogbono, suya, and so on, then add pastries like meat pie, scotch egg, etc. I am advising y'all to broaden the food varieties...For all my stay with y'all, i had to go out to fulfil that desire, was tired of burger and basmatic rice.... Catfish peppersoup is on point though. Thanks Tosin Y.

It was my birthday and my boyfriend surprised me here.Honestly it how he got the cooperation of the staff I still cant comprehend. They made me shed tears and it was very emotional for me.we indeed had a fantastic stay. Radisson is a home indeed

I had a weekend getaway with my family and friends and it was nothing but an awesome and memorable stay. All the staff I came in contact with were just too pleasant and warm especially the reception. we will surly come back

I visited with a friend on a Saturday and it was an amazing experience at the Lagoon pool terrace. We had the meaty pizza and the blu burger. The waitress was on top of her job as she kept on checking on us. Excellent service indeed and the atmosphere was good. The water view killed it for us. Radisson blu Anchorage is the perfect relaxation destination for me

It was my wife's birthday and we came to spend two nights at the hotel. Surprisingly, we were wowed with the way our room was decorated with rose petals in addition to the cake, wine and a personalized birthday card already placed in the room prior to our arrival. The room was cozy as we were given the newly renovated room with a good wooden floor. This got my taste as I do not like staying in a room with carpets. We could not leave after the two nights due to the curfew in Lagos State. The hotel management was very kind and considerable to offer us an affordable rate that made us to stay additional two nights due to the curfew. Indeed, it was a memorable experience despite the fact that we stayed beyond our initial plan. The staffs were very friendly and always eager to know

I visited with my wife and we had a beautiful experience. From the band to the staff, food, ambience.....was very memorable. They paid attention to details and were very courteous, the meals were delicious and it was just an all rounder. We would definitely be back again.

I had a wonderful evening with my wife. We were there to celebrate her birthday and it was a good evening, she was celebrated by the staff and the service was splendid. We hope to be back again for many more celebrations.

Review Title: Great Time At Radisson Blu Anchorage Hotel
Review Text: Excellent service! No better place to find comfort and delicacies. I definitely encourage everyone to visit such a beautiful place! I would not have done so much justice in my review if I had forgotten to comment on the hospitality - Next to none!

It was a very beautiful experience. Serene environment, top notch customer relations and the food tastes super delicious. It's one of the best places to hangout, I would definitely want to come back and invite my friends too. It's a really beautiful experience. It's a place I would recommend again and again to anyone.

Review Title: Hotel is average, but the hotel staffs make it a great place to stay!
Review Text: Stayed in the hotel for a long business trip, hotel facilities are good and parts of the rooms are going through renovations. The new rooms are nice to stay in but can be a bit noisey. The only reason i will return to stay in the hotel are the staffs, they are very polite, pleasant and welcoming; If they loose that, then not worth it.

I must commend the serenity.Been there with my Husband away from the regular busy and noisy Lagos.I must say it was worth the visit.Cool music,Lagoon view with the Cool wave.Your services are Second to None.I will recommend Radisson Blue anytime,anyday.

Review Title: Average for Lagos, but poor overall
Review Text: Lagos is one of the most energetic and cosmopolitan cities in west Africa, if not the contingent.  However, it's still catching up to "western" standards with regards to hotels and infrastructure.  The Radisson Blu Anchorage has been one of the better known hotels in the city and is conveniently located on Victoria Island, close to some of the newer and nicer areas of the city.  Upon our late arrival, staff were available to assist us with our luggage and we were able to check in without incident (note, the hotel does not offer rooms with 2 beds, despite what is mentioned on their website).  The rooms are good sized, but very non-descript and have the basic amenities.  Bathrooms are large, with stand -up showers.  After our long trip in, we wanted to shower before dinner.  Water

I don't think they'll be any negative review on this guy's because they're really amazing, the staffs are awesome not to talk of their services, it's really great.  The beds are really comfy I have to say this.

I can’t say enough good things about this hotel.  From the very first day they treated us like family.  Brought a surprise birthday cake to my friend and when I was sick made me special food and hot tea.  I highly recommend staying at this hotel!  Special thanks to Vanessa, Victoria, Rahmon and to the chef who made me ranch dressing from scratch and plain rice and toast when I was sick.    The only negative was that a bottle of Coke Zero was 1600Naira - when you could get a whole case for less than that at the store across the street!    But I would still stay there again in a heartbeat!

Review Title: Great expectations, not so great experience
Review Text: The good: excellent staff service, at least on the things that could be readily fixed.  Among other things, I tried room service, indicating a food intolerance, and staff followed up to ensure that the meal I had chosen would work.  Kudos!  The bad: the room smelled musty and mildew.  There was a big stain in the middle of the carpet.  The room and installations more generally are badly in need of an upgrade.  The ugly: the changing room/bathroom off of the pool stank strongly of urine.  I brought it to the attention of staff but it seems to be a systemic issue (the need for installations upgrades extends to the plumbing).

Review Title: Lovely decor! Poor service, daily buffet not worth the money

It is a good one hour from the airport. I did not stay the night I went there for a meal out.  The restaurant was untidy even though they had an hour and a half to closing time. Despite the restaurant having more empty than occupied tables there was no made up tables available apart one right at the entrance. All the rest needed cleaning up.  After going round in circles with no one to help I asked for the manager and a young lady came up so I mentioned that they had at least 15 tables used and not cleared! To my utter amazement she told me they had had a lot of guests!!! I reminded her that I had been in

Review Title: Way below expected Radisson Blu standard
Review Text: Fundamental issues at this hotel need to be addressed for its price (I paid  $170/night) and status as Radisson's upscale brand. The ambience is average but the real issue is that basic amenities don't work well. During my 5-day business  stay , the water was discolored sometimes to the point of being muddy in appearance. I had to purchase bottled water in bulk to be safe.Worse still, water was completely  unavailable for more than 6 hours on the day I checked out. The carpet in the hallway and rooms are  dated and stained. Furniture and drapes also need to be replaced to be more modern. The staff do make efforts to keep guests comfortable- shout out to Chima and the concierge team, but this cannot make up for obvious management and preventive maintenance lapses.   The first

Amazing Customer Service.Friendly and attentive staff. Excellent and delicious food. The dessert(different types of cake) was awesome.I couldnt help but to steal a glance at the restaurant's attractive ambience while I was eating.
Review Text

Great hotel amazing and friendly staff. Had our anniversary dinner with my wife and the experience was outstanding... great food selection with very attentive staffs. I will definitely recommend and revisit for my birthday celebration!

On my brief and hectic business trip I stayed at this property earlier this year in September. Let me tell you that the experience was sublime. The front office and the concierge were quick on their feet they were very helpful as well as they asked me if this was my first visit to Nigeria, which it was. They guided me and told me about the places I could visit. The room was on the second floor and was comfortable. Since it was my first visit they gave me upgraded amenities which was very nice of them. The breakfast offerings at the restaurant were good too. Their one call service is very prompt. The hotel is ideally located on Victoria Island so it's easy to move around. In my honest opinion this is what all travelers need, anticipation of needs, and they were doing everything

The room carpet felt dirty, perhaps it’s the style but it didn’t feel too clean at all. There were various items in the room in need of maintenance, holes in the sheets, broken door to the mini bar, drain cover on the shower and generally not in a great condition. This is a three star at best by the quality of the room. The food was average but the club sandwich was excellent. The staff were very helpful and especially the security officer posted down at the meeting rooms on November 28th 2019.

I was here for a one day stay. Though there were hassles getting a room owing to the fact that the hotel was fully booked Ms Funmi Adebesin was able to follow up in a professional manner to ensure I got a room.  Though my stay was short I was impressed by the breathtaking view from the Lagoon View room I was lodged in. Alway ask for the Lagoon View room when you stay here. It's worth the experience.   The complimentary breakfast was good. Wide spread and nice, clean environment. Professional service. I was impressed.   A few shortcomings though. The wifi was virtually non-existent and checking in was cumbersome. They need to work on that process to ensure wait time is reduced.   I will be returning soon.

The deck overlooking the lagoon is quite nice for a drink in the evening and the gym is decent enough. Wifi works well but seems to drop as soon as your phone goes into sleep mode.

Review Title: Nice place to have your meetings
Review Text: Was here for a meeting spent two days  at Radisson and it was a very beautiful experience. Staff are professional  and friendly. Rooms are comfortable amenities are up to standard and food is great. The terrace  is beautiful and the ambiance is zen.

So I was in Radisson blu at check-in I was really tired from my long trip and the receptionist made sure I was checked in swiftly without qualms. Dinner was sea food night and they had everything you can think off. Had a fun experience at the terrace when the live band sang. As a whole wonderful experience
Review Text

Fantastic stay good service. Would be back because this hotel is very safe, awesome view from rooms overlooking the lagoon. Great food and friendly staff always ready to assist and solve whatever issues you experience while in-house.

Fantastic stay soo far enjoying the view from my room. The food is great especially the peppered snails and chicken wings. Security  is paramount  here safest hotel i have stayed in in Nigeria. Very friendly staff. And very helpful.

Fantastic experience. Loved the ambiance the food and the staff, kudos to the security team always on top of their game Food is great and an ice cream bar on site. Great place to be. Will be back again

Had an amazing time here at Radisson staff are friendly rooms are comfortable had the most tasty chicken wings there. The live band was awesome. Breakfast was equally good but would have loved a different menu daily.

Recently went to Radisson with my family and it was an awesome experience at check in we were welcomed with warm smiles, there was an issue with our booking but the GR settled it swiftly. The food is Amazing and the service is great. Will b back during the festive season.

I was at Radisson for the weekend and I had a memorable stay and will definitely be back. The services rendered by the staff were professional, the meals were tasty, lots of variety during breakfast and a beautiful view at the outside bar. The room are a bit pricey but the services rendered was worth it.

Beautiful experience check in to check out.most romantic place to stay in Lagos great food great vibe. Check in was fast and everyone was pleasant. Same at the restaurant and bars. Live band at the terrace is a must for every visitor.

My Radisson rewards got activated; hooray!!! A brand that always keep to their promise is definitely a brand worth associating with. Apart from the professionalism of staff and the serene, security conscious facility, Radisson Blu Anchorage Hotel, Lagos provides guests with the assurance of great meals to match the warm, friendly and neatly kept rooms. My stay was definitely great with a beautiful aeriel view of the beautiful Victoria Island. The third floor helps filter the noise from the surroundings and the maintenance of the rooms are excellently executed. As always, a souvenir as token for guests at check-out will go a long way to embed the sweet memories at Radisson Blu Anchorage Hotel Lagos. It is impressive that the Radisson Group of Hotels' brand is well guarded if not

The hotel is the best I have experienced in Nigeria amongst several top others. I especially liked the view from the river side of the hotel and would prefer to stay on that side on my next trip. The window seat will be a treat for the family. The food was very homely and refreshing. TV was excellent though I would have loved to also have Channelstv/AIT on the local news stations

Review Title: Decent, no room available when we checked-in
Review Text: Decent hotel in a good part of Lagos. The reason I give it a 3 star (and want to give it a 2) is because they didn't have a room available when we check in in spite of confirmed bookings. We were 4 of us with 4 different room bookings on a business trip: we reached the hotel around 2330 and were told by the lady at the counter, we have 3 rooms, take it or can move the 4th person to another hotel. Almost a fait accompli at that time of the night. Two of us had to share. We were told that it is due a wing of the hotel under maintenance but I think that was all made up for being overbooked.  Room was okay, pretty large. Washroom is huge. Has a shower and tub separately.  Restaurant: had breakfast. Large selection. And a pleasant surprise the coffee machine was a Techniworm
Review Text

I visited the Hotel with my family 2 months back. It was indeed a wonderful experience. The artwork at the reception was captivating, beautiful view overlooking the lagoon, delicious meals, the staff are really warm and pleasant. The band outside was amazing, we sang and had fun times. My kids had a lovely time as well. We will definitely visit again.

A lovely hotel on the banks of The Lagos lagoon. The staff are warm and welcoming....always receive you with a smile. The restaurant has great offerings (local & continental). Anytime i need to relax, I come to the radisssonblu.

Review Title: Stay at the Radisson Blu Anchorage
Review Text: I stayed two weeks at the Radisson here in Lagos. My stay was very enjoyable. The hotel staff were tremendous. I ate at the restaurant every night and Phillip was outstanding. I will definitely stay here again soon.

I was at this hotel for 3 nights. Every issue raised was rectified immediately. Breakfast had a spread of varieties and staff were always willing to assist. The Front Office staff were also welcoming and friendly. The rooms are a bit pricey though but the experience was worth it.

I had a wonderful time with my friends. It was a birthday celebration. We were surprised with a cake and the band also serenaded us with songs. The water view outside was also amazing. We had a good evening and also lots of fun
I had a good stay, but my stay was cut short because the hotel was fully booked so I could not extend... the amazing thing was Angela made sure to help me book at a nearby hotel ASAP! Awesome staffs👍

It was a pleasant experience and I enjoyed my stay. The room furnishings were quite comfortable but the bed linen seemed slightly old. The internet service was fantastic. The room service-requested sometime in the early morning-was prompt.

I had a short visit to Lagos and my stay in the hotel was short but pleasant. The team was professional and did take care of all the details. The room can be improved with new carpet. I like the size of the room.

The hotel was clean and neat   The air con worked and power seemed to stay on mostly   The breakfast was a good spread   They always take care of me on the loyalty front. - this is something they are excellent at

Review Title: Rundown although I’m sure it Used to be stunning hotel
Review Text: I was a little surprised that this place is so rundown. Musty smelly room with dirty carpet, old and stained furniture, old sun-in bed. Whether this is the norm, I’m not sure. Breakfast had something for everyone, but I got the impression the hotel is not targeting an expats clientele - with the hot foods selection and all loaded with oil and not enough seating for the size and volume of clients. That said, the staff was amazing and outside the room, the hotel was quite nice and probably even quite stunning in its own day.
Review Text

I visited the Hotel with my family 2 months back. It was indeed a wonderful experience. The artwork at the reception was captivating, beautiful view overlooking the lagoon, delicious meals, the staff are really warm and pleasant. The band outside was amazing, we sang and had fun times. My kids had a lovely time as well. We will definitely visit again.

A lovely hotel on the banks of The Lagos lagoon. The staff are warm and welcoming....always receive you with a smile. The restaurant has great offerings (local & continental). Anytime i need to relax, I come to the radisssonblu.

The hotel was clean and neat   The air con worked and power seemed to stay on mostly   The breakfast was a good spread   They always take care of me on the loyalty front. - this is something they are excellent at

Breakfast had something for everyone, but I got the impression the hotel is not targeting an expats clientele - with the hot foods selection and all loaded with oil and not enough seating for the size and volume of clients. That said, the staff was amazing and outside the room, the hotel was quite nice and probably even quite stunning in its own day.
Review Text

Great hotel good location although abysmal traffic but that's not the hotels fault. We had 3 rooms and they were all lovely, staff very helpful we were upgraded. Lovely pool kids spent all thier time there. Great view over the water and good choice of food at hotel also. Would visit again.

Most thanks goes to the Concierge who helped us with direction on how to get to my places of interest. The staffs are friendly and I had a good stay in the Water view room. Will surely be back. The food was good too, especially the Pizza at the view bar. Though the AC was very cold at night but I was able to regulate it. i liked the pool at the terrace too. It was a good experience for me at the Thursday African night. I recommend this for lovers of local delicacies

It was an excellent stay. Everything was smooth and easy even though I turned up 2 hours before I was originally scheduled to. If you're ever in Lagos, check them out. They also have a nice ice cream parlour in the compound

Poor communication between night and day staff. Supervisor pays little attention to complaint and lacks empathy. Requested breakfast took ages to arrive. Restaurant cannot charge bill to room. We wished we gone to another hotel.

Review Title: Ok in parts, not ok in others. Gym needs refit, furniture an uplift and there are noise issues in some rooms. Staff good
Review Text: Some rooms have generator noise, no plugs at bedside, gym needs a refit, overall more investment is required to modernise, recycling put in place and promoted, staff is good and friendly. Good ice cream outside.

Nice hotel. Could do better with more tv channels. Gym needs a serious upgrade of equipment. Overall, good stay. I enjoyed the breakfast and the grill was not too bad as well. Location is also very good

Quite noisy if your room faces the street, rooms are a little tired. Could do with a revamp. Lovely pool and restaurant outside serving good food with good service. I've stayed in nicer rooms. No real spa and gym outdated.

Good stay in. Could be better in order to match the price. Please consider the problem areas and adjust accordingly. Thanks.  Please could wheel chairs be provided for guests who need assistance walking??.

Overall a very good facility in a strategic location. The lagoon view of the hotel makes the entire experience awesome. Excellent staff! Wellington, the sales Director was very helpful. The Thursday night live band was fantastic!

The hotel is strategically located in the Victoria Island area of Lagos. The bar has a perfect view of the Lagos lagoon with some live musical performance. However, the quality of state of the bathroom towels can be improved by prompt replacement when required.
Review Text

Hotel is very well located on Victoria Island. Good large rooms, very rich breakfast, lots of choice for lunch (local and international). Nice staff. The hotel has a well equipped gym, nice swimming pool and some shops. Close to multiple nice restaurants.

Nice ambiance, lovely room. Breakfast was a bit expensive but maybe that was the plan. My kids loved the place. Staff were courteous but rarely had a smile on their faces, but professional enough. I find myself trying to break the ice these days whenever I walk up to a reception in these parts, so it didn't bother me much. Overall I enjoyed my stay and I will definitely come back again. Maybe I will update my review.

It was great and overall, I think that I enjoyed my trip a lot. You should definitely go here if you love cockroaches on your bed. I also loved the desert and how I had to bury my wife because I needed food to survive.

I was back again, maybe my 6th time. Very good. Excellent rooms, good gym, good staff. Happy to be back.   The reception and security staff were particularly helpful and welcoming.  The ice cream parlour at the front is well worth s visit.

overall agreeable stay, room for improvement, technical condition of the hotel - plumbing - needs to be overhauled; staff tends to display sometimes quite erratic behaviour, as well in house keeping as well as at the berakfast buffet

Opportunity exist for sig. customer experience by paying attention to details and by being a little more proactive. Work on telephone, Iron and entire service experience of customers. By paying attention to details, you can improve service delivery significantly. Ensure, your dinner buffet offering remain full till close of the restaurant.

I have stayed at this location over several trips.  Each time, it is a frustrating experience.  On one trip, I had to ask for towels every day. On every trip, I have come back to my room on several days to find no towels - or just a partial set - even on the day of checkin.  This is reportedly at least a 4 star hotel, towels are a minimum.  Then add to it the rundown nature of the hotel.  The rooms are dirty...carpet, bathrooms, walls....dirty.  The chain on the door was missing, the door looked like it had been jimmied a couple of times, the bathroom shower stall leaks at the bottom, the floors are stained, and the gym is in total disrepair.

The stay was good. Clean environment and food is fantastic. I like the view across the river. That’s very nice. Temperature of the shower never drops. The one you choose would be what you get throughout the stay.

so, a lot of things to say, staff is ok, a bit to friendly if you ask me, but ok. the restaurant is expensive and not worth the value as the food si eah /so and so/  the bars are ok, the view nice and the room big /business room/ now the minuses - noise, you can hear thru walls everything - the place is a microb center.. i didnt notice there, but I took a weird  foot dissease, from the shower most likely since already told them to clean the entire place!

Horibble room (I was given a smoking room and I dont smoke - this was specified when booking hotel)  Food was too spicy. Hotel does not try hard to accommodate continental tastes  Cleanliness of the hotel was very poor with old sheets and towels
Review Text

Review Title: Excellent and lovely Hotel, from the check in and service to checking if all is ok etc...👌
Review Text: Lovely location, security and staff, would recommend Hotel to friends and family members any day worth every penny spent! From the room service, cleanliness, security and overall atmosphere Beautiful.

I was upgraded to a beautiful suite for my 2-night stay during this trip, The experience was truly exceptional, and I enjoyed my stay immensely. i loved the furnishing of the suite. The facilities were excellent and world-class, and the icing on the cake was the view of the lagoon from my room. i always enjoy staying at Radisson Blu.

I can summary my feedback to the management as 'satisfactory'. Has so much view and relaxation with the small size bed by the window and the availability of smart television in the room is definitely an edge and I am quiet please with that.

Review Title: Really disappointed, it’s expensive but the service is average.
Review Text: In our room there was a stench of closeby and the floor was dirty, they suggested a fresh up but nobody came, after a while, I called and someone came but he barely cleaned the floor, put some deodorant and left.

The entire staff of Raddison blue hotels were hospitable and their rooms and facilities were top notch. I particularly admire the services of Mrs Augustina, she was warm, welcoming and very professional.

Lovely ambience, services was top notch, adequate security. I'll definitely visit the hotel again and I hope the quality of service never falls below par. The lagoon view is quite lovely and I hope to get that view anytime I visit.

My stay at Radisson Blu (Anchorage) was worth it. It was home away from home, the ambiance, and awesome customer service was top notch. Thanks to Mrs Augustina of Sales department for making our booking, checking and stay in the hotel worth the while. Definitely coming back.

Radisson Blu Anchorage in Lagos is a great hotel with good facilities at an excellent location. Staff were friendly and professional. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and would recommend it for business and private visits.

Good time at Radisson, always fun place to be! looking forward to my next stay, Service top notch, Environment clean and classy, good value for money considering the location and very receptive staff.

Thanks to Chikodi, I don’t know if I spell the name correctly... I arrived the hotel early cause of my flight timing, the guy at the desk refuse to check me in that I should wait till 3pm for the check in time but if I want early check in I will need to pay a half day.... that’s crazy and annoying after booking for 8days, but thanks to Chikodi who instruct the guy to allow me to check in early without no additional payment. I will definitely be back soon.
Review Text

In general the bedrooms need an upgrade, stains on bedcovers and sheets, dirty windows etc. Check in desk only ever seemed to have 1 staff member trained to work on the system. No dedicated hotel cars and drivers, outsourced to a third party, therefore both times the driver was late and cars dirty and not the ‘suv’ as paid for. Very friendly staff and food quite good but overall the stay not worth the price paid.

This is excellent property. Its design, interiors and oceanfront restro are relaxing & wonderful.  need improvement in the Buffet menu and Mattress in the room. Mattress is too soft to get good sleep. If these two are taken care, I can say that this the best hotel in Lagos.

good and enjoyable. nice and wonderful. great and pleasant.         food was great  room was pleasant.  family enjoyed the hotel.  bar and restaurant was pleasant service was impeccable  food was a little expensive.

I was at the hotel for Bacardi training for three nights, had a swell time and it was an experience to remember but it’s unfortunate that I couldn’t visit the pool cos of our training schedule.. I hope to visit the pool and the fitness center when next I visit.. it was quit an experience though

All the stuff of this hotel is extraordinary friendly and supportive! This was an unforgettable experience for me. Beside that I must mention the great breakfast with its incredible variety. Sure you will not miss anything, you might be even surprised. All in all, I really had a great stay and would love to come back!

Nice hotel just by the water but a bit disappointing that the service and cleanliness is not better. No allergy friendly option available. I would have expected more considering the price level. Beginning to feel a bit warm already.

Ok, I will start with the positives: the staff was very nice. Absolutely every single person was nice and helpful and tried their best. And I am demanding... BUT there is nothing they can do with bad infrastructure. The facilities are OLD. The bar/ restaurant area is ok, the rooms are dreadful. I got the ‘business class’ highest category room, it was worst than a 3 $30 motel in the US. The smell is horrible. Everything smells: the AC smells of mold, the bathroom smells of (well) bathroom, the gym smell of sweat and the half of the gym equipment does not work. Also, the business lounge has no drinks except for coffee and tea and the snacks are so limited they disappear after 5 minutes. Also, the minibar was not fully stocked when I arrived, and then I was charged for the

Experience was great.  The ocean, city and restaurant view is exceptional.  The location and room service is also very much ok.  The swimming pool experience and view was indeed great.  Breakfast meals was delicious.

Great, it was a great experience, I loved the view, it was breathtaking... The Bathroom was great also, the services was homely... The breakfast was Great too... It was all Great... I'll just suggest that room heaters should be made available, because the room was cold even when the Air Conditioner was off

I was initially checked into a terrible smoking room that stank with burns on the floor and stains of the tables and bed. The only reason I’m giving 3 stars is because the staff were very friendly and quickly resolved this. The hotel overall is quite nice with a good waterfront terrace. There are plenty of staff but they generally seem poorly managed or trained.
Review Text

I expected more from a name like Radisson, and it can definitely be better. The hotel is very costly and the francise must always try to give guests more than to earn more. I dont understand how much it costs to provide toothbrush, toothpaste, sandal, etc. for each guest. The TV programs could be better. The food can definitely be better, not all guests are Nigerians.

I stayed for 30 days and my experience was very good overall. The food is very good and work team very welcoming. The hotel environment is also great. I enjoyed the water front view and adjoining bar. Apart from TV power timeouts, the room was very spacious and comfortable. Security standard is also commendable at hotel access points.

It's a place you'd love to visit again, though the interpersonal relationship wasn't perfect, the hotel has set up all to make your stay a memorable one, so far as you've got the cash😉. I hope to be visiting again soonest. Thank you Radisson Blu Anchorage hotel

Overall a beautiful hotel. Loved the jazz and life band music during the day and night time.  Love the sunday atmosphere. and the brunch deal on sunday.  I would definitely love to revisit this hotel in the near future.

Excellent Hotel to stay in. Security is top notch, All meals are buffet with a wide variety of choice. Swimming pool is good and the bars are nice too Staff are very friendly, helpful and professional. The security are also very Kind and helpful as well. Rooms are very clean and good value for money. Although we did not stay in a Lagoon view room, I would recommend it for the view. Small family of three can get a rollaway bed added to the room although there may be a small charge added..

Its a pretty decent hotel. Rooms were clean, TV and internet was excellent. Although food was ok but there aren't many options for vegetarians / vegans (just in case that might bother anyone) but that might be the case in most of the hotels in Nigeria. Didn't go out much so cant comment on the convenience of location..

Radisson Blue Anchorage Hotel, is locate at the river, which perfect for a nice relaxing evening after work. Service is great with a super friendly staff. Everything works great and the are no unforeseen surprises All in all a great place to.

I have stayed in this hotel a few years ago and didn’t like it so it is was interesting to go back again. I was pleasantly surprised. The rooms were spacious and clean, security was good and the views of the lagoon really makes it worth while. The restaurant is all right, breakfast was good. If I had to pick something negative - the bedding could do with an upgrade and the shower was not great. There is a great ice cream shop on the grounds and the terrace is fantastic. All in all it is very nice and safe.

Review Title: Very good hotel, but watch the double exchange fees!
Review Text: Great hotel. Location is good, ambiance is good, staff is friendly, and all said I would recommend the hotel. Only concern is that all International cards are charged in $USD rather than Naira. Not being American, I get to pay exchange fee twice : a rip-off. First, the hotel charge me in USD at a rate higher than the posted rate ( hotel gets his cut here), and then my bank charged my fees to change back to my own currency. Unacceptable practice bringing extra profits to Radisson. I have been around Lagos and Nigeria and the competition can charge you in Naira. Radisson refused.

My experience was very good overall. The security of the hotel was exceptional, and the CSO Mr. Cyril as well as the night security supervisor were very helpful in assuring and ensuring that my colleagues and I were put at ease in terms of safety and security.
Review Text

I actually didn't stayed at this hotel but spent my afternoon by the poolside and have nothing to complain about. Food was delicious & service was brisk & efficient. Staffs were friendly and accommodating. Highly recommended.

Review Title: Radisson Anchorage, Victoria Island; Lagos - You can do better!
Review Text: I left the place with a blinding sinus infection and a bad backache! The hotel practices extreme air conditioning and apparently only management can authorize regulation of temperatures. The working chair and table in the room is designed for maximum bad posture and discomfort.

The experience was acceptable . Could do with some modernisation to the rooms and bed linen.  Extremeley disappointed with the car booking service on the last day. Despite booking in advance and telling them our requirement, they delayed presenting us with the car, and it was not what we asked for. A further 39 mins later, we were told we couldn't get our car so we took a normal one instead. This led to us being delayed to our check in at the airport

Personnel very welcoming. Good location and convivial environment. Staff at the entry is fabulous and would make you feel at home. Should allow late swimming though, since more a business hotel  Should renew lining and towels

Very good experience with the services, Food, rooms and other facilities. I also do like the location of the hotel, the water body nest to it gives it a beautiful look. I look forward to visiting again soon.

It was horrible! I came for a birthday gateway with my friend, a colleague gifted me an all expense trip to Lagos with the hotel of my choice, I chose radisson and regretted it so much! When I finally got to the hotel I was rudely informed that I couldn’t get into my room because the card holder was different from my name, I understood because of fraud so I quickly asked my friend to transfer the money to card ac so I can pay...there was no compensation for this wait and they made it feel like it was my fault.  Finally got into the room, the corridor had a foul smell, the rug in the room was worn out and stained, that was when I realized i should have chosen another hotel but it was too late because my friends card would be debited if I had cancel.  My towels were old, my robe

When we come to Lagos, We always stay ad Radisson Blu Hotel during our trips. Good rooms and friendly staff, usually everyting  we ask, the hotel always try their best to satisfy and help us. Is also good the Patio on the outside so that in the evenings we can have food and drinks we'll always come back !!!

people in check in counter not professional . they asked me to wait. The lady in the reception instructing me don't stand infront of me.go & sit in waiting area. after 1 hour she made my check with all difficulty.

I appreciate all in Radisson Blu Anchorage Hotels the staff,facilities, services, location cant mention but few of this keep it up members and staff of Radisson Blu Anchorage Hotels VI Lagos.GOD bless You All

The hotel is in a very good location, big rooms with new technology, modern bathroom, big underground shopping arcade, well stuffed gymnasium, access to the Lagoon with boats and the buffet dinner is fantastic. !!!
Review Text

Great location. Parking arrangements need to be more fluid for drive-in guests. Cosy interiors but too many stains on the rug in the room. The window ledge sitting area was not spared from the furniture stains. The crew was so kind to put a birthday cake together for us - I thought this was priceless, many thanks.

Upon my visit to Radisson i noticed that there was a sharp decline in maintaining her ambience and surrounding furnitures with the rugs most especially looking untidy and had this strong damp smell that made the air intake quite inconveniencing. This affected both room and veranda.

Very good experience, matches the other Radisson’s I have stayed at, nice atmosphere, clean and very friendly staff.  They need to become environmentally friendly, massive over use of plastic bags and wrapping by the laundry people, not good at all..  lovely surroundings and good food, recommend the chicken pepper soup, extra spicy.

This hotel lacks in many departments, especially considering the price. The furniture inside the rooms is old, the AC is noisy, the neighbors were noisy even at 3 AM, but the hotel representatives didn't care, the illumination inside the rooms is very weak, the hallway carpets were extremely dirty on 1st and 2nd floor.

Review Title: Decent all round hotel. Well located
Review Text: No complaints. This is a good hotel which feels very modern. it is nicely positioned on the water. Felt secure with decent security/fences etc.. Big room. Excellent wi-fi. Great pool. Restaurant food satisfactory, if a little unexciting.

I have stayed at multiple Radisson properties around the world. This is the worst one I have experienced.   1. They will try and pass off dirty towels for fresh 2. My room was dirty when I checked in 3.Bed was stained 4. Window seat was stained 5. Laundry was poorly done and still stained after service. 6. Nothing says disrepair like a random deflated balloon hanging in the corner for a week. I pointed it out to 5 members of staff and nobody did a thing.   I complained about the experience and got upgraded to the Presidential suite whose bed was stained,the chair in the balcony was damaged and they then tried to charge me for extending my stay. Charge.For the free room.That they offered.   I haven't even told half the story. Avoid it. Lagos is difficult enough

This is my very Sincere opinion about your hotel. having stayed in the other Radisson branches in Ikeja. I look forward to greater improvement as your client base increases and you maintain patronage around Nigeria.

I enjoyed my stay at the hotel. Though I feel things could be better. The rugs at the corridors leading to the rooms should be changed. They look old and  stained. Towed in the rooms are faded. The rooms have a damp and unpleasant smell I had to change my room twice. Quality of food should be improved.

I and my wife had a restful sleep time while at your hotel with minimal interruptions except for the morning calls to check up on us. We could do without it. Overall the staff were amazing and helped meet our little request.

Lagos April 2019. Overall an excellent hotel facility, that is secured and  has a fantastic view over the Lagoon. I will recommend this hotel any day most especially  when the rates are within reach. The hotel is classy

Review Text

Great location. Parking arrangements need to be more fluid for drive-in guests. Cosy interiors but too many stains on the rug in the room. The window ledge sitting area was not spared from the furniture stains. The crew was so kind to put a birthday cake together for us - I thought this was priceless, many thanks.

Upon my visit to Radisson i noticed that there was a sharp decline in maintaining her ambience and surrounding furnitures with the rugs most especially looking untidy and had this strong damp smell that made the air intake quite inconveniencing. This affected both room and veranda.

Very good experience, matches the other Radisson’s I have stayed at, nice atmosphere, clean and very friendly staff.  They need to become environmentally friendly, massive over use of plastic bags and wrapping by the laundry people, not good at all..  lovely surroundings and good food, recommend the chicken pepper soup, extra spicy.

This hotel lacks in many departments, especially considering the price. The furniture inside the rooms is old, the AC is noisy, the neighbors were noisy even at 3 AM, but the hotel representatives didn't care, the illumination inside the rooms is very weak, the hallway carpets were extremely dirty on 1st and 2nd floor.

Review Title: Decent all round hotel. Well located
Review Text: No complaints. This is a good hotel which feels very modern. it is nicely positioned on the water. Felt secure with decent security/fences etc.. Big room. Excellent wi-fi. Great pool. Restaurant food satisfactory, if a little unexciting.

I have stayed at multiple Radisson properties around the world. This is the worst one I have experienced.   1. They will try and pass off dirty towels for fresh 2. My room was dirty when I checked in 3.Bed was stained 4. Window seat was stained 5. Laundry was poorly done and still stained after service. 6. Nothing says disrepair like a random deflated balloon hanging in the corner for a week. I pointed it out to 5 members of staff and nobody did a thing.   I complained about the experience and got upgraded to the Presidential suite whose bed was stained,the chair in the balcony was damaged and they then tried to charge me for extending my stay. Charge.For the free room.That they offered.   I haven't even told half the story. Avoid it. Lagos is difficult enough

This is my very Sincere opinion about your hotel. having stayed in the other Radisson branches in Ikeja. I look forward to greater improvement as your client base increases and you maintain patronage around Nigeria.

I enjoyed my stay at the hotel. Though I feel things could be better. The rugs at the corridors leading to the rooms should be changed. They look old and  stained. Towed in the rooms are faded. The rooms have a damp and unpleasant smell I had to change my room twice. Quality of food should be improved.

I and my wife had a restful sleep time while at your hotel with minimal interruptions except for the morning calls to check up on us. We could do without it. Overall the staff were amazing and helped meet our little request.
